88b2(mdo 'grel): 'phags so zhes rgyas par 'byung ba dang/ 'dam bu can gyi grong khyer na phyug po zhig la bu cig dang bu mo zhig dang gnyis skyes so/ /de gnyis phan tshun du shin tu mthun mo ji tsam de gnyis rtse ba las ltogs te ma'i drung du song nas smras pas/ ma bdag cag bkres kyis zan byin cig /de
88b3(mdo 'grel): gnyen rnams la yongs su 'drim pas ngal bas khyod cag rang gnyis long la zo shig smras so/ /bus smras pa/ khyod gsal shing la skyon nam ces smras so/ /bu mos smras pa/ khyod kyis dpung pa gnyis bcad dam/ bdag cag gnyis la mi sbyin pa ci ste zhes smras so zhes rgyas par
88b4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la mchog can rab tu byung bas zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// //gang+gA len pa zhes bya ba la ba ra NA ser gang+gA len pa zhes bya ba phyug po'i bu nor gyis phyug cing yangs par gyur pa/ skye bo mngon par dga' ba dpal dang/ grags pa
88b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ snyan pa dang/ blo yongs su dag pa dang/ mi dang/ glo bur du 'ongs pa dang/ rang gi mi dang/ lha dang/ dge slong de dang/ bram ze rnams kyis ming thos pa zhig byung bar gyur to/ /de dus res 'ga' zhig na skyed mos tshal gyi dga' ba yid kyis myong bar bya ba'i phyir be ra
88b6(mdo 'grel): tA ser song ste/ phyi rol na kun tu 'khyam pa las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gnas dga' zhing rab tu nyams dga' ba drang song chen po'i tshogs kyis 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya bar phyin no/ /de shin tu ngo mtshar shing rmad du byung
88b7(mdo 'grel): bas dga' ba chen po'i spyod pa mgo dang/ sha dang khrag dang/ mig dang/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ rta dang/ glang po che dang/ bu dang/ bu mo dang/ rgyal srid la sogs pa du mas slong ba'i skye bo rnams la rnam par 'gyed cing dga' bar byed pa/ brtul zhugs dang nges
89a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang sdom pa yang dag par bden pas mi dge ba'i rtsa ba las nges par byung zhing rnam pa du ma sna tshogs kyis dka' ba mang po spyod pa las skyes pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid srog chags gzhan rnams kyis bsgrub cing rtogs par bya ba ma yin pa'i pha rol
89a2(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa shes bya mang po'i ma lus pa'i dra ba'i dngos po'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i gzhir gyur pa/ shes bya'i rgya mtsho chen po yang dag par bsrung ba las yang dag par byung ba/ bdag med pa'i ye shes rin po che rags pa dang/ phra ba dang/ nang dang/ phyi rol dang/
89a3(mdo 'grel): thag ring ba dang/ nye ba dang/ rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud la brten pa'i sgra dang don gyi bdag nyid du ma'i de kho na nyid rab tu rig pa/ thams cad rig pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab kyi chos nye bar bstan pa yid yang dag par byung ste/ 'khor bar gnas pa'i
89a4(mdo 'grel): nye bar spyod pa phab pa la mi bltos shing/ rab tu byung ba'i bde ba mchog la bltos shing yid la byed par gyur kyang pha dang ma las snang ba ma thob pa rab tu byung ba'i dngos po mi 'thob par yid la byas te/ pha dang mas rjes su gnang bar byas pa'i phyir yid la 'chi bar
89a5(mdo 'grel): the tshom za ba tsam gyis gnas skabs gzhan thob kyang rjes su snang ba ma thob nas rim gyis srungs ma rnams snyoms las byed par gyur pa'i tshe gnyen dang khyim spangs te/ gang dang gang na bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos kyi tshogs dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa/
89a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan gang yang rung ba dge slong dag bzhugs pa'i sa de dang der song ngo/ /de dang der bdag nyid kyi dgos pa smras pa dang/ pha dang mas ma gnang bar bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'jug cing yon tan gyi tshogs su gyur pa'i rab tu byung ba ma rnyed par sems la
89a7(mdo 'grel): bsams te/ skye ba 'di la bdag gis rig? la? sla yis rab tu byung bas ma thob kyis skyes gzhan du yang 'di dag nga'i bar chad du ma gyur cig ces gang bdag shi nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i rgyus smon lam sngon du btang ste bdag nyid btang bar
89b1(mdo 'grel): bya'o? zhes de dug zos kyang ma shi'o/ /mtshon gyis btubs kyang mchod cing/ g.yang dum tshengs? pa dang/ ri dang glang po smyon pa dang/ gang 'brog dgon par lcug mas bdag nyid bcings pa dang/ de lta bu la sogs pa srog gi bar chad du ma las 'ongs te/ gshin rje'i mche ba'i bar du
89b2(mdo 'grel): zhugs par ma gyur nas dbugs dron mo ring po 'byin zhing 'dug go /yang smras pa/ gang las lha dang lha min mi'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal thob/ /'jig rten gsum mgon ring na gnas kyang drung du drangs te 'joms/ /de ni bdag gis mdza' grogs bzhin du btsal kyang
89b3(mdo 'grel): ma rnyed ba/ /'chi la 'chi pa gzhan zhig yod dam cis ni mi mngon gyur/ /yang 'di snyam du rnam pa thams cad du 'chi ba'i thabs khyad par can gzhan zhig yod kyis de ni de ba rtsam par bya ste/ rgyal po'i khab tu song la gzhan gyi rdzas ma byin par blangs na de'i 'bras bu
89b4(mdo 'grel): gnas par 'gyur te/ ma ga d+ha na rgyal po ma skyes dgra chad pa drag po byed pa yod de/ nges thos nas rkun ma zhes mthar byed cing? gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes de rgyal po'i khab du phyin nas skye bo mang pos mthong ba nyid du rku bar brtsams pa dang/ rkun ma
89b5(mdo 'grel): rkun ma zhes srung ma rnams kyis gang+gA len bzung ste lha 'di ni rjes su mi mthun zhing grong khyer gyi rkun ma ste/ rgyal pa'i khab kyi phyug po rnams rtogs par byed par yid ches pa rnams yid mi ches pa skyed par byed pa yin no zhes rgyal po la phul lo/ /de yang rgyal
89b6(mdo 'grel): pos khyod rkun ma yin nam zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ des yin no zhes smras so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ rgyal po'i khab kyi tshad? pa drag cing che ba ma thos sam/ nges smras pa/ ma thos pa yang ma yin mod kyis/ 'on kyang mi rig pa la chags pa dang/ de la
89b7(mdo 'grel): 'jigs par mi gzung bas/ des na bdag gis 'jigs med par/ /rkun ma bya bar brtsams pa yin zhes pa dang lha 'on kyang/ gang la gang zhig mngon 'dod ba'o/ /dngos po de la de sbyar bya/ nyid ni bsrung bar bzhed pa ste/ bdag ni rku bar 'dod pa yin/
90a1(mdo 'grel): de nas rgyal po spos kyi glang po che myos pa'i rdul gyis dri bsnam zhing yang dag par tshor ba shin tu khro ba'i snyigs mas bzhin bsgyur te/ gang gal len la khang pa der sdigs mjug ste smin ma khro gnyer bskyed de/ gshed ma la tshig 'di skad du sdig pa
90a2(mdo 'grel): byed pa 'di nyes par spyod pa 'di myur du rgyal po'i khab pa thams cad kyis thos par gsal shing la bskyon cig ces bka' stsal to/ /gshed ma'i skyes bu de dag gis ka ra bI ra'i me tog mgul bar btags te/ gsal shing bstan pa dang/ rgya che zhing mthob phrag pa
90a3(mdo 'grel): la bkal te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi tshong dus dang/ 'dun sa dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dang/ ra ba tha dad pa du ma rnams su thos par/ kye mi dag 'di ni rkun ma ste me tog nang gi sbrul nag po ltar phyug pa thams cad dngul por byed pa rgyal po'i chos lugs las
90a4(mdo 'grel): 'das pa de rgyal po'i bka' lung gis sdig pa byed pa 'di gsal shing la bskyon pa khyod cag bltos shig ces smras so/ /des smras pa/ bzhin bzad dag myur bar gsal shing rtse mo la rgyal po'i bka' lung bsgrubs shig /de dag gis smras pa/ rim pa 'di lta
90a5(mdo 'grel): bus bya ba brtsan pa ma yin nam/ des yang smras pa/ 'chi ba'i bgegs su mi 'gyur bar myur du gyis shig /de dag gis smras pa/ khyod gson pa'i don du rkun ma byed pa ma yin nam/ ji ltar 'tsho ba yongs su btang bar lan mang du sems sam/ des smras pa/
90a6(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba 'di las gzhan med do/ /yang smras pa bud med byis pa gzhon nu rgan pa lang tshor babs mdun du/ /rkun ma nyid du rig par byas shing dpung pa rab bcings nas/ /rgyal pos bsad? par bka' lung stsal pa khyod kyi lag gnas pa/ /'chi bdag yul las 'gro
90a7(mdo 'grel): ba gzhan med 'di ni nges pa yin/ /phan tshun du smras pa/ 'dis ni ma ga d+ha'i yul pa thams cad kyi rdzas 'phrog par nus so/ /ci ste zhe na/ 'tsho bas? yang bltos med par/ gzu lum su ni 'dug pa'i mi/ /'di la bsod nams yang na ni/ /rtogs par bya ba cung
90b1(mdo 'grel): zad med par me sdig pa spyad pa bdag cag gis bsad par bya ba ni mang du mthong ste/ kha cig myos 'gyur 'dod cing ngo gzhan dag zas la gzhan ni chu/ /gzhan ni gnyen mthun mthong ba'i bde ba 'dod cing gzhan ni chang/ /bsang? bya'i skye bo phal cher gzhan ni skad cig gson pa tshe la/ /khyod ni
90b2(mdo 'grel): srog nyams 'dod pa 'di ci rnam pa 'di gang las/ /des smras pa/ gang gis gang la dpal du rtogs pa des de don du gnyer par byed pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi lugs yin la/ bdag kyang 'chi ba la dpal du rtogs nas don du gnyer ba yin kyis/ myur du bdag gi yid la re zhing don
90b3(mdo 'grel): du gnyer ba yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig /gzhan du na bdag rkun ma zhes bstan pa don med par 'gyur ro/ /yang smras pa/ gsal shing la bskyon skra grol lus las khrag 'dzag cing/ /mig gi 'bras bu bya rog gis bton 'og tu 'jog pa dang/ /spyang ki kangka stag gis
90b4(mdo 'grel): sha dang khrag dag yongs su bgreng gyur nas/ srog gi sbyin pa btang ste dur? khrod gnas su bdag srog dor ba bltos/ /de dag phan tshun du brtags te smras pa/ rnam pa du ma'i brjod pa 'di ni ngo mtshar te/ slar rgyal pos ma thos kyi bar du bdag cag gis de gsal zhing la
90b5(mdo 'grel): bskyon par mi nus so/ /de nas gshed ma'i skyes bu zhig log ste rgyal po la zhus so/ /rgyal pos bkug nas dris pa khyod kyis 'di skad du brjod pa bden nam/ des lha mang lags so zhes smras so/ /rgyal pos smras pa shi ste don ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des smras pa/
90b6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gson bzhin ston pa ma thob na/ /shi nas ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ /gang las nges pa 'di skyes pa/ /ci yi don du bden par smros/ /des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gal te bdag smra na rab tu byung ba'i phyir bdag
90b7(mdo 'grel): shi bar 'dod do/ /rgyal pos smras ba/ khyod kyis go rim bzhin du ma bstan gyis/ /de ji ltar go rim bzhin du rgyas par smros shig /nges ji ltar brjod pa bzhin du rang gi gtam rgyas par smras nas gsol pa/ lta gzigs mdzod cig /gang las srog sbyin la sogs
91a1(mdo 'grel): thub pa sdug bsngal myong gyur pa/ /de yi thams cad gzhan don bcas shing rang min gzhan don 'jug /de ltar rig kyang gang zhig bka' la gnas par mi byed pa/ /'du shes med cing rtswa phyung dang 'dra sa yi/ bur bus zad/ /ston pa zhir gshegs de'i tshogs
91a2(mdo 'grel): ri mo 'drar thar gyur pa'i lam/ /de yi go 'phang sems rmongs 'phel bas btubs shing bsgribs pa na/ /phan pa ji ltar bya bar nus zhes de ltar nges par ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa ji srid blta ba'i sgra ni stobs med bya/ /gang zhig ngan 'gro sna tshogs bdag nyid gang du bkod pa
91a3(mdo 'grel): ngad/ /gnas gcang? spangs pa'i bde 'gror yun ring ma skyes gang zhig yod/ /rnam mang gnas su bung bar ma gyur sems can gang zhig yod/ /blo sngan rang gzhan de ltar mthong ba 'gro ba'i phra rgyas 'grol/ /rgyal pos de'i tshig thos nas pad+ma'i sbubs ltar de mtshang ba'i spyan
91a4(mdo 'grel): gyis smras pa/ kye bdag gis gzu lums su dpyad pa sngon du ma btang par gshed ma las bka' lung stsal lo/ /phyir rgol smra bar gyur pa sna tshogs kyi/ /las dang 'bras bu lkog gyur ma mthong ngam/ /khyod kyis bden pa mthong bar gyur tam ci/ /thub ces the tshom bsams
91a5(mdo 'grel): pa 'di cis 'phags/ /sems la sangs rgyas rjes su dran bcas khyod bsad? cing/ /'jig rten gnod bcas bdag gis 'gro ba gang zhig 'gyur/ /bu gcig dga' bar mdzod cig sems dang bka' yi gnod bsal te/ /rim gyis lung bstan rab byung dngos po
91a6(mdo 'grel): thob la shes par 'gyur/ /gsang bya gsang bya ma yin gnod dang zhi 'bras dka' lung can/ /'di la pha dang ma bzhin rgyal 'bangs kun la mnga' bdag ste/ /khyod ni nga yis srog sbyin bu yi mchog yin te/ rjes su gnang nas rab byung zhi thob the tshom ma byed cig/ bu
91a7(mdo 'grel): mthong ngam/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje mchog gi spyod pa sna tshogs mda' ba/ bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin dang/ dbang po yongs su smin pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ dus dang/ dus ma yin pa'i gnas skabs la
91b1(mdo 'grel): bltos nas gdul bya la 'jug ste/ nga 'di snyam du khyod la rnam par smin pa'i nges pa'i las kyis 'phangs pa yod pas thugs rjes btang snyoms su mdzad do zhes dgongs so/ /drang srong chen po gang? la dus min dang/ /snod min mi 'bab btang snyoms mi mdzad pa/ /de'i phyir rnam pa
91b2(mdo 'grel): 'dis ni btang snyoms mdzad/ /dus dang snod dang phan par gzigs nas gsung/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bos te smras pa/ rgyal po'i khab pa rnams la 'di rgyal po'i bu yin no zhes thob par gyis shig /de nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po'i bu la 'os pa'i gos
91b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ rgyan dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bran la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ rgyal po la sogs pa'i glang po che la bskyon nas grong khyer du bos pa/ ya mtshan can dang/ thos pa dang bcas pa khyod rnams nyon cig /'di ni yul ba
91b4(mdo 'grel): ra NA ser phyug po'i bu gang+gA len zhes bya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar 'dod pa na pha dang ma las snang ba ma thob nas bdag ci nas 'jig rten pha rol tu thob par 'gyur zhes de 'chi ba'i thabs gzhan rtogs nas rkun mar? bstan te gsang par bka' lung
91b5(mdo 'grel): stsal ba 'di da ltar rigs gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa'i rtog mthu'i che ba'i bdag nyid sa chen po'i thig le gcig par rgyal bar bya ba las rnam par rgyal ba'i lha ma skyes dgra'i sras su skyes so zhes thos par bya ste/ dga' ba dang skyo ba yang dag par skyes pa mang po phyi nas
91b6(mdo 'grel): 'brang zhing mdun du byas te/ rgyal pos gnad nas smyug ma'i nags tshal gang na ba der song ngo/ /de der sngon gyi dus su byas pa'i rgyus bar chad thams cad zad cing nye bar grol te/ thob par rigs pa rab tu byung ba phun sum tshogs pa thob bo/ /de rab tu byung ba phun sum
91b7(mdo 'grel): tshogs pa thob nas yid la byed pa phung po dang khams rab tu rnam par dbye ba rtog pa'i rim gyis kun tu sbyong ba dang/ 'chid ba dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang/ kun nas dkris pa thams cad bcad kyis lcags sgrog gis 'ching ba shes rab kyi ral gris yang dag
92a1(mdo 'grel): par bcad nas 'jig rten thams cad kyi tsha ba'i chi bar mchod par bya ba 'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /'dir mdo las bsdus te brjod kyi/ rgyas par ni rtog pa rjod pa brgya'i sdom? gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa'i brgyad pa las
92a2(mdo 'grel): blta bar bya'o// //chod dpon gyi bu grags pa gzhon nu zhes bya ba la/ bcom ldan 'das pa ra NA se'i chu bo sgrib ming kyi 'gram na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ba ra NA se na grags pa mchog gi rigs kyi bu zhig yod de/ nyin par bud med kyi rol mos rtse zhing dga' la yongs su spyod
92a3(mdo 'grel): pa lus chad cing lus ngal? te lus lci bar gyur pas gnyid log par gyur to/ /bud med de dag kyang lus chad cing lus ngal te lus lci bar gyur pas gnyid log par gyur to/ /grags pa mchog gi rigs kyi bus bud med de dag sgren? mor khu chu 'dzag pa skra grol ba lag pa dag
92a4(mdo 'grel): yengs pa gzhan dang gzhan gyi brdol smras byed pa dag mthong nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor de dag la dur khrod kyi 'du shes byung bar gyur te/ de nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu mal stan chen po las babs te/ brgya stong ri ba'i mchil lham gnyis gon nas btsun mo'i grong
92a5(mdo 'grel): khyer gyi sgo khang gang na ba der nye bar song ste/ nye bar song nas/ kye grogs po dag bdag ni rab tu gtsos so/ /bdag ni nye bar gtsos so/ /zhes 'o dod? bos pa mi ma yin pa rnams kyi sgo phye nas sgra mi thos par byas so/ /de nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu tshong dus kyi sgo gang na
92a6(mdo 'grel): ba der nye bar song song ste nye bar song nas kye grogs po dag bdag ni rab tu gtsos so ba sha? ni? nye bar gtsos so zhes 'o dod bos pas de ni ma yin pa rnams kyis sgo phye ste sgra mi grag par byas so/ /de nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu tshong dus kyi sgo gang na ba der nye bar song nas kye grogs po dag bdag
92a7(mdo 'grel): ni rab tu gtsos so/ /bdag ni nye ba gtsos so zhes 'o dong bos pa de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis sgo phye ste sgra mi thos par byas so/ /de nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu chu bo sgrib med kyi 'gram gang na la der nye bar song ngo/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das chu bo sgrib med kyi 'gram /
92b1(mdo 'grel): phyi rol bla gab med pa na 'chag cing 'chag nas bzhugs pas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu rgyang ring po nas 'ongs pa gzigs shing rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhin nus bcom ldan 'das chu bo sgrib med kyi phyi rol bla khab med pa na 'chag cing 'chag par mthong nas dge spyod bdag ni gtses so
92b2(mdo 'grel): kye dge sbyong bdag ni rab tu gtses? so zhes 'o dod bos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye gzhon nu tshur shog /'di na nye bar 'tshe ba med pa dang/ nye bar 'tshe ba med pa'i gnas yod do/ /de nas rigs kyi bu grags
92b3(mdo 'grel): pa gzhon nu brgya stong ri ba'i mchil lham brur? dag chu bo sgrib med kyi ngos su bor nas chu bo brgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/ nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das
92b4(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu dang gtsug lag khang gang na ba der nye bar gshegs te/ nye bar song nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
92b5(mdo 'grel): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
92b6(mdo 'grel): 'das kyi sngon gyi dus kyi rgyu chos kyi gtam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang/ tshul khrims kyi gtam dang/ mtho ris kyi gtam dang/ 'dod pa rnams ro chung zhing nyes dmigs mang ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang/ thar pa dang/ dben pa dang/ bsnga?
92b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i phyogs rgyas par yang dag par gsal bar mdzad do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis des dga' pa'i sems dang/ dge ba'i sems dang/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang/ sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang/ 'khor ba las yang dag par 'da' 
93a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos bstan pa shes par nus shing rigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'khor ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po
93a2(mdo 'grel): rgyas par rab tu gsal bar mdzad do/ /'di lta ste/ gos dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag pa btso blag mkhan gyi lag du gtad na yang dag par tshan 'dzin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu stan la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par
93a3(mdo 'grel): rtogs te/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam mo/ /rigs kyi bu grags pa gzhon nu chos mthong ba dang/ chos thob pa dang/ chos rig pa dang/ chos rtogs pa dang/ chos la the tshom dang yid gnyis dang bral ba dang/ gzhan gyi
93a4(mdo 'grel): rkyen gyis bkri bar bya ba ma yin pa ston pa gzhan gyis bstan pa'i dring mi 'jog pa/ chos la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun ba bdag
93a5(mdo 'grel): ni mngon par 'phags so/ /rab tu 'phags so/ /de nas bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /dge bsnyen du gzung du gsel/ /de nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsngos te skyabs su 'gro zhing mngon par dang ngo/
93a6(mdo 'grel): de nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas gzhan zhig gnyid sang de bltas pa na grags pa gzhon nu rang gis mal stan chen po la mi snang ba mthong nas khyim bdag rigs mchog gi khang pa gang na ba der nye bar song ste/ nye bar song nas khyim bdag rigs mchog la 'di skad
93a7(mdo 'grel): ces kye? jo bo grags? pa gzhon nu rang gi mal stan chen po la mi snang ba mkhyen par mdzod cig ces smras so/ /de nas khyim bdag rigs mchog 'di snyam du ci grags pa gzhon nu rkun ma 'am g.yon can gyis nor gyi phyir phyi rol tu khyer bar ma gyur snyam du rig par byas nas/
93b1(mdo 'grel): pho nya rta ba bzhi brdzangs so/ /rang nyid lag na mar me thogs pa'i skyes bu dang lhan cig chu bo sgrib med gang na ba der nye bar song nas/ khyim bdag rigs mchog gis chu bo sgrib med kyi 'gram du brgya stong ri ba'i mchil lham zung cig bzhag pa mthong nas de yang 'di snyam du ci gzhon nu
93b2(mdo 'grel): 'di rkun ma 'am g.yon can gyi nor gyi phyir phyi rol tu khyer bar ma gyur te/ 'di lta ste chu bo sgrib med kyi 'gram du brgya stong ri ba'i mchil lham gnyis bo bzhag pas so/ /gzhon nu 'jug dogs 'di nyid nas chu bo sgrib med brgal bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ chu bo sgrib med kyi
93b3(mdo 'grel): 'gram du brgya stong ri ba'i mchil lham gnyis po 'di bzhag par byas so zhes rig par byas nas 'jug dogs de nyid nas chu bo sgrib med brgal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ngo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po nas khyim bdag rigs mchog 'ong
93b4(mdo 'grel): ba gzigs nas 'di snyam du gzhon nu 'di stan 'di las 'dug bzhin du mi mthong bar 'byung ba de lta bu'i ngas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grags pa gzhon nu stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du khyim bdag rigs
93b5(mdo 'grel): mchog gis mi mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /de nas khyim bdag rigs mchog bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/ nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das grags pa gzhon nu gang du
93b6(mdo 'grel): song ba gzegs lags sam/ khyim bdag 'dug cig dang/ stan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du grags pa gzhon nu mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do/ /de nas khyim bdag rigs mchog 'di snyam du gal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu mthong bar 'gyur ram snyam mo//
93b7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag des na gang gi tshe stan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du grags pa gzhon nu mthong bar gyur pa'i gnas de yod do/ /de de ltar rigs nas dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes te bcom ldan 'das
94a1(mdo 'grel): kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag rigs mchog bcom ldan 'das kyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par zhes snga ma bzhin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na
94a2(mdo 'grel): khyim bdag rigs mchog chos? rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa skyes so/ /grags pa gzhon nu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul?
94a3(mdo 'grel): mngon par 'du bya ba de slar brtul te/ tshigs su bcad ba 'di skad ces dka' stsal to/ /brgyan par byas kyang chos spyod cing/ /dul bsdams tshangs par spyod gyur cing/ /sems can kun la dbyug pa spangs/ /bram ze dge sbyong dge slong ste/ /de'i tshe dgra bcom pa drug
94a4(mdo 'grel): yod la bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das yin no/ /khyim bdag rigs mchog gi grags pa gzhon nu stan de nyid la 'dug pa mthong ste/ grags pa gzhon nu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu ma lus dal ba dang/ lus chad pa dang smre sngags 'don par 'gyur gyis khyim du 'dong?
94a5(mdo 'grel): ngo?/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag ji snyam du sems/ gang gis mi slob pa'i ye shes dang mi slob pa'i mthong bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po mngon par rtogs kyang khyim gyi gnas su 'dug cing
94a6(mdo 'grel): yongs su bsags pa'i 'dod pa la longs spyod dam/ btsun pa ma lags so/ /ji ltar khyim bdag khyod slob pa'i ye shes dang/ slob pa'i mthong bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs pa de bzhin du grags pa gzhon nu mi slob pa'i ye shes dang mi slob
94a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i mthong bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs so/ /btsun pa grags pa gzhon nu thob par legs par thob ste/ mi slob pa'i ye shes dang/ mi slob pa'i mthong bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das grags
94b1(mdo 'grel): pa gzhon nu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong dang rigs mchog gi khyim gan? ba der gshegs pa thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag rigs mchog la cad? mi gsung par snang ngo/ /de nas khyim bdag rigs mchog bcom ldan 'das kyis cad mi gsung
94b2(mdo 'grel): par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te song ngo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyin zhag de nyid kyi snga dro chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang bzhin dge slong grags pa gzhon nu dang khyim bdag rigs mchog gi khyim ga la ba der gshegs so//
94b3(mdo 'grel): de'i dus na tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo chen po dang gnyis pa mdun na gnas ma zhes bya ba lam gyi bar na bcom ldan 'das nam gshegs zhes sems shing 'dug go /tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo chen mo dang/ mdun gnas ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan
94b4(mdo 'grel): 'das rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ste/ mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs sam/ bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhugs su gsol zhes zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams
94b5(mdo 'grel): pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo chen mo dang mdun gnas ma gnyis kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyab byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo gnyis po chen mo dang mdun gnas ma
94b6(mdo 'grel): gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par ji srid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par rtogs te/ snga ma bzhin du skyabs su song zhing sems mngon par dang ba'i bar du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo chen mo dang mdun
94b7(mdo 'grel): gnas ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de nas btsun pa 'dir zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo gnyis po chen mo dang? mdun gnas ma gnyis la cad? mig? sung bar gnang ngo//
95a1(mdo 'grel): de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun ma gnyis po chen mo dang mdun gnas ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa grags pa gnyis bde bar zhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing gya nom pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rang gi lag nas brims
95a2(mdo 'grel): zhing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gtsang zhing gya nom pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rang gi lag nas tshim par brims pa rig cing/ lhung bzed rgyu ba dang/ stan dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das
95a3(mdo 'grel): kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i btsun mo chen mo dang/ mdun gnas ma gnyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcul? yang dag par gzed bstong/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so//
95a4(mdo 'grel): mi ma yin pa rnams kyis sgo phye zhing sgra mi thos par byas te/ 'di 'ga' zhig gis kyang bsad par ma nus te/ skye ba tha ma pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'tsho byed kyang mas sgrom du bcug ste rgyal po'i sgor bskyur ba las bden par mthong bar rig par ma shi zhes gtam
95a5(mdo 'grel): rgyud rgyas par 'dul ba las gos kyi gzhir blta bar bya'o/ /sogs pa'i sgras b+ha ba lob ta ka la sogs pa srid pa tha ma pa bden pa mthong bar rigs pa dag las g.yang sar bskyur ba yang ma shi bar dper byas pa ste/ de nyid kyi phyir ji skad bshad pa thams cad
95a6(mdo 'grel): bsdu ba'i don du srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang zhes smos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' i yum de lhums na gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' i mthu dang lha'i mthus rmad du byung ba'i sems mi mngal du zhugs pa
95a7(mdo 'grel): la ji skad du/ ma ni bde zhing sems la sdig bral dang/ /skyes pa gzhan la 'dod pa med par 'gyur/ /khyim gyi phyogs bzhir lag na mtshon thogs pa'i/ /lha rnams bsrung ba'i don du khyab cing gnas zhes bya'o/ /yang ci'i phyir mdo las btsun pa zhes bya ba ni lus
95b1(mdo 'grel): thob ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar gyi skabs su bris zin to/ /bde ba skye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gleng bzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /bde ba skye ba na rnam pa gsum ste/ 'di dag gi lus dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas mngon par tshim zhing yongs su
95b2(mdo 'grel): tshim zhing yongs su dga' zhing yongs su khyab ste gnas so/ /de dag gi lus la rnam pa thams cad du mi gsal ba dang ma khyab pa cung zad kyang med de/ dben ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ yid bde ba ldan zhing tshe ring zhing dus ring mo zhig tu gnas pa'i sems can de dag
95b3(mdo 'grel): yod de/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams te/ 'di ni bde ba skye ba dang po yin no/ /'di dag gi lus ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba mngon par tshim zhing yongs su tshim la yongs su dga' bas yongs su khyab ste gnas so/ /de dag gi lus la rnam pa thams cad
95b4(mdo 'grel): du mi gsal ba dang ma khyab ba cung zad kyang med de/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshe ring zhing dus ring mo zhig tu gnas pa'i sems can de dag yod de/ 'di lta ste 'od gsal gyi lha rnams te/ 'di ni bde ba skye ba gnyis pa yin no//
95b5(mdo 'grel): 'di dag gi lus dga' ba med pa'i bde bas mngon par tshim zhing yongs su tshim la/ yongs su dga' bas yongs su khyab ste gnas so/ /de dag gi lus la rnam pa thams cad du mi gsal ba dang ma khyab pa cung zad kyang med de/ dga' ba med pa'i bde ba ldan zhing tshe ring
95b6(mdo 'grel): zhing dus ring mo zhig tu gnas pa'i sems can de dag yod de/ 'di lta ste dge rgyas kyi lha rnams te/ 'di ni bde ba skye ba gsum pa yin no zhes bka' stsal to/ /sems can lus tha dad pa dag kyang yang de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam pa shes pa gnas pa bdun du blta
95b7(mdo 'grel): par bya zhing/ bcu las 'phros pa las 'don pa lta bu dang/ 'di nyid du mdzod kyi gnas dang por de bzhin gzhan yang ci rigs par zhes bya bar skye mched gnyis po zhes bya ba'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin no/ /mdo las gsum po 'di dag gi 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid
96a1(mdo 'grel): yin no zhes gsungs pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /dge slong dag gsum po 'di dag ni 'dus byas 'dus byas su mtshon par byed pa ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dus byas skye bar yang mngon no/ /'jigs pa dang gnas ba las
96a2(mdo 'grel): gzhan du 'gyur bar yang mngon no/ /'dus ma byas ni skye bar mi mngon zhing 'jig pa dang gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur bar mi mngon no zhes bka' stsal to// //dper na skye ba'i 'byung ba zhes bya ba dang/ mi rtag pa nyid kyis 'jig pa zhes bya ba la/ ji skad du 'du byed
96a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad mi rtag ste/ /skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/ /skyes nas 'jig par 'gyur bas na/ de dag nye bar zhi ba bde zhes 'byung ngo/ /de lta yin pas rigs kyi bu dpa' bo'i tshor ba ni rig bzhin du zhes bya ba la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /dge slong dag stobs
96a4(mdo 'grel): dang ldan zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi bu dga' bo la yang dag par smra bas smra'i/ dge slong dag mdzes pa dang 'dod chags shas che ba zhes bya ba ni tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la yang dag par smra bas smra'i/ gzhan la ni ma yin no/ /dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' bo dbang po'i
96a5(mdo 'grel): sgo yongs su bsdams shing gnas pa dang/ zas kyi tshod shes pa dang/ nam gyi cha stong dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor la brtson par gnas pa dang/ dran pa dang shes bzhin mchog dang ldan pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang yongs su
96a6(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa spyad par nus so/ /dge slong dag de la rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i dbang po rnams kyis yongs su sgo bsdams pa gang zhe na/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' po mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin la/ mngon rtags su mi 'dzin cing mig
96a7(mdo 'grel): gis dbang po lhag par sdom pas gdams shing gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems zab pa dang bral zhing de dag la 'bad pa dang/ sdom zhing srung ste/ mig gi dbang po la mig gi dbang po bsdams te
96b1(mdo 'grel): gnas so/ /rna bas sgra dang/ snas dri dang/ lces ro dang/ lus kyis reg bya dang/ yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin la zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sdom zhing srung ste/ yid kyi dbang pos yid kyi dbang po bsdams te gnas
96b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i bar du ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag de la rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i zas kyi tshod shes pa gang zhe na/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' bo shes bzhin du zas za ste/ rtse ba'i phyir ma yin/ rgyags pa'i phyir
96b3(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ 'tshig gi phyir ma yin/ rnam par brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ ji srid du lus gnas shing rten pa dang/ bkres pa bzlog pa dang/ tshangs par spyod pa/ rjes su bzung ba'i phyir ro/ /tshor ba snga ma bzlog cing tshor ba/ gsang pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang/ gang
96b4(mdo 'grel): las stobs dang bde ba la reg pas gnas par bya ba'i phyir te/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta mkhan gyi skyes bu shing rta'i mig tu mar ram til mar skud par byed pa na rtse ba'i don du ma yin/ rgyags pa'i don du ma yin/ 'tshig gi don du ma yin/ rnam par brgyan pa'i don du
96b5(mdo 'grel): ma yin gyi/ ji srid du khur theg par bya ba'i don du'o/ /skyes bu sman can rma la mar ram til mar skud par byed pa na/ rtse ba'i don du ma yin/ 'tshig gi don du ma yin/ rnam par brgyan pa'i don du ma yin gyi/ ji srid du rma las thar bar bya ba'i don du'o/ /dge slong dag
96b6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dga' bo shes bzhin du zas za bar byed ces bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du bde ba la reg par gnas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i zas kyi tshong? shes pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag de la rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i
96b7(mdo 'grel): nam gyi cha stong dang cha smad la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa gang zhe na/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' abo nyin mo rgyu ba dang gnas pa dag la chos rnams la sems sgrib pa med cing yongs su dag go/ de mtshan mo'i thun dang po la rgyu ba dang gnas ba
97a1(mdo 'grel): dag las chos rnams la sems sgrib pa med cing yongs su dag nas mtshan mo'i thun bar pa la gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa bkrus nas glo g.yas pa phab ste/ rkang pas rkang pa mnan nas/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis smad ba'i 'du
97a2(mdo 'grel): shes dang ldan pa'i 'du shes yid la byed cing nyal bar byed do/ /de mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la myur ba myur bar langs nas rgyu ba gnas pa dag la chos rnams la sems sgrib pa med cing yongs su dag go /dge slong dag 'di ni rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i nam gyi cha stong dang cha smad la
97a3(mdo 'grel): mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag de rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i dran pa dang shes bzhin mchog gang zhe na/ dge slong dag de rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i shar phyogs su blta ba na sems thams cad dang ldan pas blta bar byed do/ /de gal te lho dang nub dang
97a4(mdo 'grel): byang phyogs su blta ba na yang sems thams cad dang ldan pas blta bar byed do/ /de ltar blta bas na 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba sdig pa mi dge ba dag las sems zag pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i tshor ba ni rig
97a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin du skye'o/ /rig bzhin du gnas so/ /rig bzhin du nub pa dang yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ba de yang dran bzhin du yin gyis ma dran par du ni ma yin no/ /'du shes dang spyod pa yin bzhin du skye ba dang/ rig bzhin du gnas pa dang/ rig bzhin
97a6(mdo 'grel): du nub pa dang/ yongs su zad pa dang/ yongs su 'jug par 'gyur te/ de yang dran bzhin du yin gyi/ ma dran par ni ma yin no/ /dge slong dag 'di ni rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i dran pa dang shes bzhin mchog ces bya'o/ dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/
97a7(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste rigs kyi bu dga' bo ltar dbang po'i sgo rnams yongs su bsdams te gnas pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu dga' bo zas kyi tshod shes pa dang/ 'di lta ste rigs kyi bu dga' bo bzhin du nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la brtson pas gnas
97b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ rigs kyi bu dga' bo bzhin du dran pa dang shes bzhin mchog dang ldan par dge slong dang dga' bo la gdams ngag 'dis dga' bo bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /de nas dge slong ma gzhan zhig gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/ /dbang po bsdams shing so sor dran ldan dang?
97b2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin zas tshong mnyam por rig pa dang/ /sems kyi rgyu mtshan de 'drar rig pa dag /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bor bcom ldan gsung zhes smras so// //tshigs bcad ming la brten pa ste zhes bya ba la gleng gzhi'i mnyan du yod pha na'o/ /de nas lha gzhan zhig kha dog mngon par
97b3(mdo 'grel): 'phags shing rab tu 'phags pa dang mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar 'ongs te/ nye bar 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /da dung yang lha'i kha dog gis dze ta'i tshal thams cad du snang ba rgya chen pos khyab
97b4(mdo 'grel): par gyur cing phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe lha des? tshigs su bcad ba 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshigs bcad rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ /de yi bkod pa gang zhig yin/ /tshigs su bcad pa gang la brten/ /tshigs bcad gzhi ni ci zhig yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba
97b5(mdo 'grel): tshigs bcad rgyu ni 'dod pa ste/ /de yi bkod pa yi ge yin/ /tshigs bcad ming la brten pa ste/ /tshigs bcad gzhi ni snyan ngag mkhan/ /de nas lha de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag
97b6(mdo 'grel): byas te de nyid du mi snab bar gyur to// //zag pa gang dag gi skye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das ko tu pa na ko tu pa'i kal ma shad dam mya na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/ dge slong dag shes pa dang mthong
97b7(mdo 'grel): pas zag pa zad par nga smra'i/ mi shes pa dang mi mthong bas ni ma yin no/ /dge slong dag 'di ltar ci zhig shes pa dang mthong bas zag pa zad par nga smra'i?/ mi shes pas mi mthong bas ni ma yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste tshul bzhin du ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin
98a1(mdo 'grel): yid la byed pa'o/ /dge slong dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed na 'dod pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes nas 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur la/ srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa 'phel
98a2(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag tshul bzhin yid la byed pas 'dod pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi skye cing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /srid ba'i zag ba dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag byis pa so so'i
98a3(mdo 'grel): skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa skyes bu dam pa ma mthong zhing 'phags pa'i chos la mi mkhas shing 'phags pa'i chos kyis ma dul de 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mi shes te/ bdag gi chos so zhes tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pas 'dod pa'i
98a4(mdo 'grel): zag pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing/ skyes pa 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar yang bdag gis chos la tshul bzhin yid la byed pas
98a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa skyed cing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi skyed cing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mi shes pas chos gang dag yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i
98a6(mdo 'grel): chos de dag yid la byed cing/ chos gang dag yid la bya ba'i chos de dag yid la mi byed de/ /de chos gang dag yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i chos de dag yid la byed cing/ chos gang dag yid la mi byed pas ni 'di ltar 'dod pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur
98a7(mdo 'grel): zhing skyes pa 'phel bar rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing skyes pa 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar yang bdag gis chos la yid la byed pas 'dod pa'i zag pa ma bskyed pa mi bskyed
98b1(mdo 'grel): cing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi bskyed cing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro zhes de 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pas chos gang dag yid la bya ba mi byed cing/ chos gang dag yid la bya ba'i chos de dag yid la byed do/ /de
98b2(mdo 'grel): chos gang dag yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i chos de dag yid la mi byed cing/ chos gang dag yid la bya ba'i chos de dag yid la byed pas 'di ltar 'dod pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi bskyed cing skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /srid pa'i zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa ma skyes pa mi bskyed cing
98b3(mdo 'grel): skyes pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag zag pa dang bcas pa gegs su gyur pa'i yongs su gdung ba nye bar 'khrug pa de ni rnam pa bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ zag pa dang bcas pa mthong bas spong bar bya ba yang yod/ zag pa dang bcas pa bsdams pa spang bar
98b4(mdo 'grel): bya ba yang yod/ zag pa dang bcas pa spangs pas spang par bya ba yang yod/ zag pa dang bcas pa bsten pas spang par bya ba yang yod/ zag pa dang bcas pa dul bas spang bar bya ba yang yod/ zag pa dang bcas pa bzod pas spang bar bya ba yang yod/ zag pa dang bcas
98b5(mdo 'grel): pa bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba yang yod do/ /zag pa dang bcas pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/ dge slong dag byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa dag skyes bu dam pa ma mthong zhing 'phags pa'i chos la mi mkhas pa 'phags pa'i chos kyis mi dul ba de
98b6(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed do/ /bdag 'das pa'i dus ma? byung bar gyur tam/ 'on te bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar ma gyur/ bdag 'das pa'i dus na ci 'dra bar byung bdag 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar byung bar gyur zhes bya ba dang/ phyi ma'i mthil rjes su
98b7(mdo 'grel): 'brang bar 'gyur te/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ci 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ma 'ongs pa sdom pas bsdams pas zhes bya'o/ /zag pa dang bcas pa spangs pas spang
99a1(mdo 'grel): par bya ba gang zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di la glang po che/ smyon pa thag ring du yongs su spang bar bya zhing/ khyi smyon pa dang/ ba brdung ba dang/ rta rgod dang/ gnas mi shes pa dang/ ngam grog dang/ mtsho dang/ g.yangs dang/ shing rta dang/ ljan ljin
99a2(mdo 'grel): sdig pa can dang/ tha chad dang/ sdig pa can gyi grogs po dang/ sdig pa can gyi mal cha dang/ stan dang/ mal cha dang stan 'di lta bu la yongs su zhen pa mkhas pa tshangs par spyod pas mi srid pa srid par 'gyur ba dang/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa rtog par byad ba de lta
99a3(mdo 'grel): bu'i mal cha dang stan ring du yongs su spang par bya ste/ spangs na zag pa dang/ gegs dang/ yongs su gdung ba dang/ 'khrug pa skye bar yongs su spang par bya ste/ 'di ltar zag pa dang/ gegs dang yongs su gdung pa dang/ 'khrug pa mi skye pa 'di ni spangs
99a4(mdo 'grel): pas spang par bya ba zhes bya'o/ /zag pa dang bcas pa bstan pas spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di la dge slong so sor brtag nas chos gos gon par byed kyi rtse ba'i phyir ma yin/ rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'tshag gi phyir ma yin/ brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin
99a5(mdo 'grel): gyi/ ji srid du sbrang bu dang/ sha sbrang dang/ rlung dang tsha ba dang/ sdig sprul gyi rag pa gzhom par bya ba'i phyir dang/ ngo tsha ba dang gsang ba'i gnas dgab par bya ba'i phyir gon par byed do/ /so sor brtag nas bsod snyoms bsten par byed kyi rtse ba'i phyir ma yin/
99a6(mdo 'grel): rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'tshag gi phyir ma yin/ brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin gyi ji srid du lus 'di gnas pa dang mi bskom pa dang/ bkres pa bsal ba dang/ tshangs par spyod pa rjes su gzung ba dang/ tshor ba rnying ba rnams bsal shing tshor ba gsang
99a7(mdo 'grel): ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang/ 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang/ stobs dang/ bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i don du'o/ /so sor brtags te mal cha dang stan la nyal par byed de/ rtse ba'i phyir ma yin/ rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin/ 'tshag gi phyir ma yin/
99b1(mdo 'grel): brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ ci srid du tha mal ba'i yongs su 'jig pa rnams gzhom pa dang/ ma nyams par bzhag pa'i phyir ro/ /de so sor brtags te na ba'i gsos sman bstan par byed de/ rtse ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ ji srid du lus kyi tshor
99b2(mdo 'grel): ba sdug bsngal ba drag pa rtsub pa gnad gcod pa yid du mi 'ong srog 'phrog par byed pa bsal zhing dga' ba dang ldan par bya ba'i don du'o/ /gang zhig so sor ma brten pa zag pa dang bcas pa gegs? yongs su gdung ba dang nye bar 'khrug pa mi skye ba 'di ni so sor brtan pas spang bar bya ba
99b3(mdo 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /zag pa dang bcas pa dul bas spang par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di la dge slong 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyes pa mi bzod cing spong zhing srid la thag ring du byed pa dang/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa skyes pa ni bzod
99b4(mdo 'grel): cing spong ba srid pa dang thag ring du byed cing 'dul ba/ zag pa dang/ bgegs dang/ yongs su gdung ba dang/ nye bar 'khrug pa skyes pa 'dul bar byed cing 'di ltar mi skye bar byed la/ zag pa dang/ gags dang/ yongs su gdung ba dang/ nye bar 'khrug pa 'dul bar byed
99b5(mdo 'grel): pas sdom pa zhes bya'o/ /zag pa dang bcas pa bzod pas spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di la dge slong dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas te/ stobs dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus dang/ spro ba dang/ brtan pa dang/ pha rol gnan pa khur mi 'dor ba gang
99b6(mdo 'grel): gi pags pa dang/ rtsa rgyus dang/ rus pa tsam zhig lus shing lus kyi sha dang/ khrag skam kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus dang/ spro ba dang/ brtan pa dang/ pha rol gnon pa dang khur mi 'dor ba gang gis thob par bya ba ma thob pa de srid du brtson 'grus brtsom
99b7(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur te/ de 'di snyam du brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas nas lus dal ba skyes sam/ sems dal lam/ lus dang sems la rims nad byung ngam/ lus dang sems yongs su gdung ba 'am/ lus dang sems yongs su 'khrug pa skyes kyang tshe dang ldan pa
100a1(mdo 'grel): de de'i rgyus brtson pa yongs su mi 'dor ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa de bkres pa dang skom pa dang/ sbrang bu dang/ sha sbrang dang/ rlung dang/ tsha ba dang/ sdig sprul gyis reg pa dang/ gzhan gyis shes par smras pa dang/ nyes par brjod pa'i tshig gis lam
100a2(mdo 'grel): rnams bzod cing/ lus kyi tshor ba sdug bsngal pa drag pa rtsub pa gnad gcod pa yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog par byed pa skyes shing skyes pa bzod par 'gyur zhing bzod pa bskyed do/ /gang zhig mi bzod na zag pa dang bcas pa gegs yongs su gdung ba nye bar 'khrug pa skye
100a3(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ba de 'di ltar bzod na zag pa dang bcas pa gegs yongs su gdung ba nye bar 'khrug pa skye bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni zag pa dang bcas pa bzod pas spang bar bya ba zhes bya'o/ /zag pa dang bcas pa bsgom pas spang par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di la dge slong nye bar
100a4(mdo 'grel): len pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga rnams la skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can du rdzas su blta zhing gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di ni gzugs so/ /'di ni gzugs kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni gzugs 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam
100a5(mdo 'grel): par shes pa'o/ /'di ni rnam par shes pa kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog pa'o zhes de nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga po 'di nyid la skye ba 'jig pa'i chos can du rjes su blta zhing gnas te/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
100a6(mdo 'grel): dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong ba yongs su bsgyur ba sgom par byed do/ /chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ dga' ba dang/ shin tu sbyangs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin
100a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ btang snyoms byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong ba yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom par byed de/ gang zhig ma bsgom na skye bar 'gyur ba'i zag pa dang/ gegs dang yongs su
100b1(mdo 'grel): gdung ba dang nye bar 'khrug pa de dag 'di ltar bsgom pas zag pa dang gegs yongs su gdung ba dang 'khrug pa skye bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni zag pa dang bcas pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba zhes bya'o/ /de ltar na dge slong zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag mthong bas spang par bya ba de dag mthong bas
100b2(mdo 'grel): spong bar 'gyur ro/ /zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag bsdams pas spang bar bya ba de dag bsdams pas spong bar 'gyur ro/ /zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag yongs su spangs pas spang bar bya ba de dag yongs su spangs pas spang ngo/ /zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag so sor brten
100b3(mdo 'grel): pas spang bar bya ba de dag so sor brtan pas spong ngo/ /zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag dul bas spang bar bya ba de dag dul bas spong bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zag pa dang bcas pa gang dag bzod pas spang bar bya ba de dag bzod pas spong bar byed de/ zag pa dang bcas
100b4(mdo 'grel): pa gang dag bsgom pas spang bar bya ba de dag bsgom pa yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba 'di ni dge slong zag pa thams cad las sems rab tu bsdams pa zhes brjod de/ srid pa chad pa/ kun tu sbyor ba spangs pa/ yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis sdug bsngal mthar byed par
100b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/ /de ltar na rab tu byed pa'i gzhung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ rab tu byed pa las dri ba stong 'byung pa las 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dbye ba'i mdo'i 'phags pa'i bden ba bzhi'i dri pa dang lan las ji skad du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
100b6(mdo 'grel): rgyu can yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu ma yin pa ni du 'jig tshogs lta ba'i rgyu yin la/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can ma yin pa ni du/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba rgyu can yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang yin pa ni du/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
100b7(mdo 'grel): rgyu can yang ma yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang ma yin pa ni du zhe na zhes dri ba bkod nas lan gtab la/ gnyis ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang ma yin la/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang ma yin no/ /gnyis la ni bye brag yod de sdug bsngal
101a1(mdo 'grel): gyi bden pa dang/ kun 'byung ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu ma yin te/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang yan la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang yin pas dang/ 'gog pa dang
101a2(mdo 'grel): lam gyi bden pa ni 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang ma yin 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang ma yin pas so/ /de la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu ma yin pa ni 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sdug bsngal
101a3(mdo 'grel): mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas rnams dang/ de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ma gtags pa dang/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang/ de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi skye ba dang rba kha dang/ gnas pa dang/ mi rtag pa ma
101a4(mdo 'grel): gtogs pa de las gzhan pa sdug bsngal gyi bden pa nyon mongs pa can gang yin pa 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yin la 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang yin la 'jig tshogs lta ba'i
101a5(mdo 'grel): rgyu can yang yin pa ni gar dag ma gtogs pa rnams so/ /'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu can yang ma yin la/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu yang ma yin pa ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/ 'di ltar sdug bsngal dang
101a6(mdo 'grel): kun 'byung gi bden pa'o// //gzugs bskyed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang/ rkyen gang dag yin pa de dag kyang zhes bya ba la/ glong gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /dge slong dag gzugs bskyed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang/
101a7(mdo 'grel): rkyen gang yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag na/ rgyu dang rkyen mi rtag pa las brten nas byung ba'i gzugs la brtag par ga la 'gyur/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang/ rkyen gang yin pa de dag kyang mi rtag na
101b1(mdo 'grel): rgyu dang rkyen mi rtag pa las brten de skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa lta rtag par ga la 'gyur/ dge slong dag gzugs mi rtag pa tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste sdug bsngal ba/ gang sdug bsngal ba de bdag med pa/ gang bdag med pa de
101b2(mdo 'grel): thams cad de'i med pa/ nga yid bya ba med pa/ bdag gi bdag tu bya ba med pa/ 'di lta ste yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi lta bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag de ltar mthong ba'i 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa gzugs la yid 'byung zhing/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed
101b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ rnam par shes pa la yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang yid 'byung ba de 'dod chags dang bral lo/ /'dod chags dang bral na grol bar 'gyur ro/ /grol na rnam par grol ba'i ye shes dang/ mthong bas bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa brten to/ /bya ba byas so//
101b4(mdo 'grel): srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// //sdug bsngal spangs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di ji ltar drang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /dbang po lnga po 'di dag kun tu bsten
101b5(mdo 'grel): goms par byas lan mang du byas nas 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sdug bsngal spangs par 'gyur zhing mi 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ dge slong dag dad pa'i dbang po kun tu bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang
101b6(mdo 'grel): da ltar byung ba'i sdug bsngal spangs shing mi 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po kun tu bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i
101b7(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal spangs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so// //gzugs la 'dun pa dang 'dod chags gang yin pa de spongs shig ces bya ba la sogs pa la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /dge slong dag gzugs la 'dun pa dang 'dod chags gang yin pa de spongs
102a1(mdo 'grel): shig /'dun pa dang 'dod chags spangs na khyod kyis gzugs de lta bu yang spang na pa dang yongs su shes par yang 'gyur te/ shing rta la rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du mi snang ba dang phyis mi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag tshor ba dang/
102a2(mdo 'grel): 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa la 'dun pa dang 'dod chags gang yin pa de spongs shig /'dun pa dang 'dod chags spangs na khyod kyis 'dun pa dang 'dod chags yongs su spangs par 'gyur te/ shing tA la rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du snang ba dang phyis yongs
102a3(mdo 'grel): su mi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// //dper na sred pa rnam par spyad pa dag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /dge slong dag dra ba dang 'khri shing dang/ mtsho dang/ rab tu 'phags pa dang gang gi skye dgu la
102a4(mdo 'grel): sgrib pa/ rab tu sgrib pa/ khyab par byed pa/ rab tu khyab par byed pa/ bkab? pa dang/ g.yogs pa dang/ rab tu 'gebs pa dang/ dru bu 'dzings pa lta bu/ rtswa mun dza dang ba la dza lta bu dang/ 'gro ba dang 'ong bar gyur cing 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu nying mtshams
102a5(mdo 'grel): sbyor bar byed pa 'khor bar 'khor zhing 'jug par byed pa bstan par bya ste/ dge slong dag srid pa'i dra ba dang/ 'khri shing dang mtsho dang/ rab tu 'bab pa dang/ gang na gang dang gang gis skye dgu la sgrib pa byed pa nas nying mtshams sbyor bar byed la 'khor bar 'khor zhing
102a6(mdo 'grel): 'jug par byed pa'i bar du byed pa de gang zhe na/ dge slong dag nga'o zhes bya ba byung bar gyur cing/ nga 'di lta bu'o zhes bya ba byung bar gyur cing/ nga 'di 'dra'o snyam du byung bar gyur cing/ nga de lta ma yin no snyam du byung bar gyur cing/ nga bzang ngo snyam du byung bar gyur cing/
102a7(mdo 'grel): nga ngan no snyam du byung bar gyur cing/ 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang/ 'gyur bar mi bya'o snyam pa dang/ 'di lta bur 'gyur bar bya'o/ /'di 'dra bar 'gyur bar bya'o/ /de lta ma yin par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang/ 'di lta bur gyur cig snyam pa dang/ 'di 'dra bar gyur cig snyam
102b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ de lta ma yin par gyur cig snyam pa dang/ gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang/ 'di lta bur gyur kyang ma rung snyam pa dang/ 'di 'dra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang/ de lta ma yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung zhes dge slong dag nang gi bdag nyid la brten te/ sred pa spyod pa bco brgyad
102b2(mdo 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de la bdag go snyam pa byung bar gyur cing/ bdag 'di lta bu'o snyam pa byung zhing/ bdag 'di 'dra'o snyam pa byung zhing/ bdag bzang po snyam pa byung bar gyur cing/ bdag ngan no snyam pa byung bar gyur la/ 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa gyur zhing 'gyur bar mi bya'o
102b3(mdo 'grel): snyam pa dang/ 'di lta bur 'gyur bar bya snyam pa dang/ 'di 'dra ba 'gyur bar bya snyam pa dang/ de lta ma yin par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam pa dang/ gyur cig snyam pa dang/ 'di lta bur gyur cig snyam pa dang/ 'dri 'dra bar ma gyur cig snyam pa dang/ de lta ma yin par gyur cig snyam pa dang
102b4(mdo 'grel): gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang/ 'di lta bur gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang/ 'di 'dra bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang/ de lta ma yin par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa zhes dge slong dag phyi'i bdag nyid la brten nas sred pa spyod pa bco brgyad po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
102b5(mdo 'grel): de gcig tu bsdus na sred pa spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag 'das pa'i dus la brten nas sred pa spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug byung la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la brten nas sred pa spyad pa sum cu rtsa drug 'byung zhing/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la brten nas sred
102b6(mdo 'grel): pa spyod pa sum cu rtsa drug byung ste/ gcig tu bsdus na sred pa spyod pa brgya rtsa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag 'di ni sred pa'i dra ba dang/ 'khri shing dang/ mtsho dang/ rab tu 'bags pa dang/ gang dang gang gis skye dgu 'di la sgrib pa dang rab tu sgrib pa zhes bya ba nas/
102b7(mdo 'grel): 'khor bar 'khor ba sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /dge slong dag sred pa'i dra ba dang/ 'khri shing dang/ 'tsho dang/ rab tu 'bags pa gang dang gang gis skye dgu 'di la sgrib pa dang rab tu sgrib pa khyab par byed pa/ rab tu khyab par byed pa/ bka' ba dang/ g.yogs pa dang/
103a1(mdo 'grel): rab tu 'gebs pa dang/ dru bu 'dzings pa lta bu/ rtswa mun dza dang/ ba lang dza lta bu dang/ 'gro ba dang 'ong bar gyur pa 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu nying mtshams sbyor bar byed cing 'khor bar 'khor bar byed pa bstan par bya'o zhes ji skad du
103a2(mdo 'grel): bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do zhes bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang dag 'dus byas kyang rung 'dus ma byas kyang rung ba de dag gi mchog ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin par bshad do zhes bya ba la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /dge slong
103a3(mdo 'grel): dag btags pa'i mchog ni rnam pa gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ btags pa'i mchog sangs rgyas dang/ btags pa'i mchog chos dang dge 'dun no/ /btags pa'i mchog sangs rgyas gang zhe na/ sems can gang rkang pa med pa dang/ rkang gnyis pa 'am/
103a4(mdo 'grel): rkang mang ngam/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs can ma yin pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam 'du shes med pa dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched gang ci yang rung ba de dag gi nang nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
103a5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas ni mchog ces brjod do zhes bya'o/ /gang cung zad sangs rgyas la mngon par dang bas lha'i nang na lhar gyur pa mi'i nang na ming gyur pa de dag ni rnam par smin pa'i mchog la reg par bya'o/ /'di ni brtags pa'i mchog sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /btags pa'i
103a6(mdo 'grel): mchog chos gang zhe na/ 'dus byas kyang rung 'dus ma byas kyang rung chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag gis na mchog ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin par bshad de/ gang cung zad chos la mngon par dad pas mngon par dang ba/ lha'i nang na ltar gyur pa/ mi'i nang
103a7(mdo 'grel): nang na mir gyur pa/ de dag ni 'di ltar rnam par smin pa'i mchog la re bar bya ste/ 'di na btags pa'i mchog chos zhes bya'o/ /btags pa'i mchog dge 'dun gang zhe na/ 'dus pa 'am tshogs sam tshogs pa 'am 'khor gang ci yang rung ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni
103b1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yin par bshad de/ gang cung zad chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dang bas mngon par dad pa/ lha'i nang na lhar gyur pa/ mi'i nang na mir gyur pa de dag ni 'di ltar rnam par smin pa'i mchog la re bar bya'o/ /'di ni btags pa'i mchog
103b2(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun zhes bya'o zhes gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /chos mchog rnam par shes nas ni/ /yon tan bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mchog la rab dang ba/ /'jig rten mchog la rab tu dang/ /nyer zhi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i/ /chos mchog
103b3(mdo 'grel): la ni rab dang dad/ /bsod nams zhing mchog bla med pa'i/ /dge 'dun mchog la rab dang cing/ /mchog gi sbyin pa byed pa la/ /bsod nams mchog ni rab tu 'dzin/ /tshe dang kha dog mchog dang ni/ /grags dang stobs dang bde ba dang/ /mal stan mchog dag thob 'gyur zhing/ /longs
103b4(mdo 'grel): spyod sbyor pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gnas mchog la ni gnas pa dang/ /mdzes pa'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /sbyin pa mchog la sbyin pa dang/ /chos kyi mchog dang ldan pa dang/ /shes rab phun sum tshogs byas nas/ /mya ngan 'das par 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bka' stsal to// //
103b5(mdo 'grel): mdo las mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes bya ba la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /de nas dge slong gzhan zhig nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang la ba der nye bar song ste/ nye bar song nas bcom
103b6(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa dge slong mthong ba'i chos las mya ngan las 'da' ba thob pa dge slong mthong ba'i chos las mya ngan las
103b7(mdo 'grel): 'das pa thob pa zhes bya ba/ btsun pa ji tsam gyis na mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong du gyur/ ji tsam gyis na bde bar gshegs pas mthong ba'i chos las mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes tha snyad gdags pas btags/
104a1(mdo 'grel): de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong legs so legs so/ /dge slong khyod 'di lta bu'i dri ba 'dri ba mthong ba'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du tha snyad
104a2(mdo 'grel): btags zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /dge slong khyod 'di lta bu 'dri 'am/ btsun pa de bzhin no/ /de'i phyir dge slong legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /dge slong gzugs la skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa dang nye bar len pa med par zag pa
104a3(mdo 'grel): las sems rnam par grol zhing gnas na mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes brjod par nus so/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa la skyo ba dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ 'gog pa dang nye bar len pa
104a4(mdo 'grel): dag las sems rnam par grol zhing gnas na mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes brjod par nus te/ dge slong 'di tsam gyis na mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong 'di
104a5(mdo 'grel): tsam gyis na bde bar gshegs pas mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dge slong zhes tha snyad btags so/ /de nas dge slong de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
104a6(mdo 'grel): spyi bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung nas song ngo/ /'di skad du sdug bsngal 'di ma lus par spangs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gcig pu dben pa na nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas
104a7(mdo 'grel): pa na sems la yongs su rtog pa/ dge slong ji ltar shes shing ji ltar mthong na chos mthong bar 'gyur zhes 'di lta bu skyes so/ /de nas dge slong de nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ nye bar song nas zhes pa nas/
104b1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa bdag 'di na gcig pu dben pa na nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa na sems la yongs su rtog pa/ ji ltar shes shing ji ltar mthong na chos mngon par 'gyur zhes 'di lta bu skyes so/ /dge slong de'i phyir
104b2(mdo 'grel): legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang gnyis shig bshad par bya'o/ /gnyis gang zhe na/ mig dang/ gzugs dang/ rna ba dang sgra dang/ yid dang chos kyi bar du ste/ 'di ni gnyis zhes bya'o/ /dge slong gang kha cig 'di skad du dge slong gau ta ma btags pa 'di ni gnyis ma yin
104b3(mdo 'grel): gyis/ bdag gis 'di ltar gnyis po de las bzlog pa gzhan gnyis gdags par bya'o/ /zhes smra ba 'di ni tshig tsam dang/ dris pa'i lan yang dag par mi shes shing mgo rmongs par byed pa ste/ 'di ltar de'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong
104b4(mdo 'grel): mig dang gzugs la brten nas skyes pa mig gi rnam par shes pa dang/ gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang sems pa zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong bdag gi gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi dang/ gzugs can mig
104b5(mdo 'grel): gi dbang po ste/ 'di tsam la mi zhes bya'o/ /de la sems can dang mi dang shed las skyes dang shed bu dang gang zag dang srog dang egso ba zhes 'dogs so/ /dge slong de la bdag gi mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ngo zhes bya ba las/ yid kyis chos rnams rnam
104b6(mdo 'grel): par shes so zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar 'dogs so/ /de la 'di dag kyang tha snyad de tshe dang ldan pa'i ming ni 'di zhes bya/ rus ni 'di lta bu/ rigs ni 'di lta bu/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong/ tshe ring zhing yun ring po 'di tsam zhig tu gnas/ tshe'i mdza' 
104b7(mdo 'grel): ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur ces bya ba 'di ni dge slong dag 'du shes tsam 'di ni dam bcas pa tsam mo/ /ji ltar 'di thams cad tha snyad cig tsam yin zhe na/ dge slong chos 'di dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa dang/ mngon par 'dus byas pa dang/ sems las byung ba dang/
105a1(mdo 'grel): brten de skyes pa'o/ /gang mi rtag pa/ mngon par 'dus byas pa sems las byung ba brten de skyes pa de dag ni sdug bsngal ba/ de ni sdug bsngal skye ba dang/ sdug bsngal gnas pa dang/ mngon par 'phel ba dang/ gang sdug bsngal yang dang yang du rab
105a2(mdo 'grel): tu 'byung ba'o/ /gang sdug bsngal 'di ma lus par spangs pa/ byang bar gyur pa/ zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'gog pa/ rnam par zhi ba/ nub pa/ sdug bsngal gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa/ len pa med pa/ 'byung ba med pa gang yin pa 'di lta bu ste/ phung po thams
105a3(mdo 'grel): cad nges par spangs pa/ srid pa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'gog pa mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ dge slong gang 'ga' zhig chos 'di rnams la sems shing 'jal ba dang gnas pa 'di ni phyis yid la yongs su gdung ba mi 'jug cing len pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /dge
105a4(mdo 'grel): slong ci ste gang bdag gi sa bdag 'di ltar shes shing 'di ltar mthong ba de chos mngon par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang reg bya la brten nas skyes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa dang/ lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang/
105a5(mdo 'grel): 'du shes dang/ sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag gi gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi dang/ gzugs can lus kyi dbang po ste 'di tsam la mi zhes bya'o/ /de la sems can dang mi dang shes las skyes pa dang/ shed bu dang skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang
105a6(mdo 'grel): srog dang gso ba zhes tha snyad 'dogs so/ /dge slong dag de la bdag gi mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas/ yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes so zhes bya ba'i bar du tha snyad 'dogs te/ de la 'di dag kyang tshe dang ldan pa'i ming 'di zhes bya
105a7(mdo 'grel): ba nas/ dge slong gang 'di ltar shes shing 'di ltar mthong ba de chos mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /dge slong yid dang chos la brten nas skyes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i tshor ba dang/ 'du shes
105b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ sems pa zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong bdag gi gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi yin la/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i lus te 'di tsam la mi zhes bya ba'o/ de la sems can dang/ mi dang shed las skyes pa dang shed bu dang skyes bu dang gang zag dang srog dang gso ba zhes
105b2(mdo 'grel): 'dogs so/ /dge slong de la bdag gi mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas/ yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes so zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar 'dogs so/ /de la 'di dag kyang tha snyad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa'i ming ni 'di zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gang 'di ltar shes shing
105b3(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar mthong ba de chos mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mig dang gzugs dag gnyis la brten nas ni//
105b4(mdo 'grel): skyes par gyur pa sems las byung ba'i chos/ /rnam shes reg dang lhan cig tshor ba dang/ /'du shes sems dpa' dang ni rgyu dang bcas/ /gang zag shed las skyes dang shed bu dang/ 'di na bdag gam bdag gir bya ba med/ /phung po sdug bsngal yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos/ /skye ba'i
105b5(mdo 'grel): chos can 'jig pa'i chos can yin/ /sems can mi dang shed skyes shed bu ste/ /'di dag yod ces 'dir ni btags pa yin/ /phung po'i rgyu mtshan rgyu las de dag las/ /gzhan yang rnam mang 'du shes skye bar 'gyur/ /ci ste dge slong bram ze gzhan gang dag /bdag cag
105b6(mdo 'grel): gnyis las gzhan gnyis 'chad smras pa/ /tshig gi mngon par brjod pa'i skal ba can/ /'dri ba'i lan dag rab tu mi shes yin/ /las dang sred pa dang ni ma rig pa/ /phyi ma'i tshe la 'du byed rnams kyi rgyu/ /phung po dag las phung po gzhan yang du/ /nying mtshams sbyor ba
105b7(mdo 'grel): gang zag ces smra'o/ /sred pa ma lus nye bar zhi ba dang/ ma rig nub cing rab tu 'gag pa na/ /sred pa zad pas sdug bsngal rab zad par/ /'di ltar spyan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs zhes bka' stsal to// //mar me shi bar gyur pa ltar zhes bya ba
106a1(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa la/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo dang/ dbyangs kyi tshogs kyi mdo las/ tshangs pa'i sgo'i mdor 'don 'don pa lta bu ste/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma dag pa nyid du tshe dang ldan
106a2(mdo 'grel): ba ma 'gags pas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ dbugs rdub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba dang/ /sems brtan par ni skyob pa gnas/ /mi g.yo zhi ba rtogs nas ni/ /spyan ldan yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /gang tshe rnam kun stobs lnga pa/ /ston pa dus mdzad gyur
106a3(mdo 'grel): pa na/ de tshe 'jigs pa'i rgyu byung zhing/ /ba spu ldang ba byung bar gyur/ /zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis na/ tshor ba yongs su bzod mdzad cing/ /mar me shi bar gyur pa ltar/ /de yi sems kyis rnam par thar/ /lam gyi tshogs las kyang bslab pa'i sgo'i mdo
106a4(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar tshigs su bcad pa 'don te/ de dag srog dang bral gyur cing/ /rnam par sred zad rnam par grol/ /mar me shi bar gyur pa ltar/ /sems ni de yis rnam par thar/ /zhes mdzod kyi gnas brgyad par tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi rang
106a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin zhes mdo 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /mdo las rkyen nyid ni bzhi ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ bzhi las 'phyos pa'i mdo las/ rab tu rig dang rkyen dang ni bya bar gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /zhes 'don pa lta bu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
106a6(mdo 'grel): kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /bzhi po 'di ni bsams gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas te/ bsam par byed na smyo bar 'gyur zhing mgo rmongs
106a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang sems g.yengs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag bsam pa dang/ 'jig rten bsam pa dang/ sems can gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul lo zhes bka' stsal to// //
106b1(mdo 'grel): mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa'i dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pa la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /dge slong dag mi sdug pa bsgom par byed cing kun tu brten cing lan mang du byas na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur zhing bsdags pa che bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar 'bras
106b2(mdo 'grel): bu che bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar 'bras bu che ba dang bsdags pa che ba'i sdug pa bsgom par 'gyur zhe na/ dge slong 'di la mi sdug pa dang lhan cig pa'i bran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su
106b3(mdo 'grel): bsgyur bar sgom par byed de/ dge slong 'di la mi sdug pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang/ dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba
106b4(mdo 'grel): la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba sgom par byed de/ dge slong 'di lta bur 'bras bu che ba dang bsdags pa che ba'i mi sdug ba bsgom par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/ /chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi mdo dang sbyar ba'i Tik+ka nye bar mkho ba
106b5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba las gnas gnyis pa phal cher mdo dang sbyar ba'o/ /'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod pa min zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /de na tshe dang ldan pa 'dod pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste/ nye bar song nas phyogs
106b6(mdo 'grel): gcig tu 'dug pa'i bar du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dod pa can bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa 'dod pa 'dod pa zhes bgyi ba 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig bla dags lags/ 'dod pa 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di 'dod pa'i yon tan
106b7(mdo 'grel): lnga'i tshig bla dags ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang 'dun pa'i 'dod chags 'di la 'dun pa zhes bya'o/ /'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod pa min/ /skyes bu'i kun rtog 'dod chags 'dod pa yin/ /'jig rten dag na sna tshogs de bzhin gnas/ /'on kyang brtan rnams de la 'dun pa
107a1(mdo 'grel): 'dul/ /btsun pa 'on kyang lam rtogs shing brten pa dang/ bsgom pa dang lan mang du byas nas 'dun pa dang 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur ba yod dam/ 'dod pa can yod de/ di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang dag
107a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i lta ba nas/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar du'o/ /btsun pa rab tu rtogs pa dang/ brten pa dang/ bsgom pa dang/ lan mang du byas na 'dod pa spong ba'i lam 'di ni bzang ngo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dod pa can bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
107a3(mdo 'grel): par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te zhabs drung nas song ngo/ /'dod pa ni 'dod chags zhes rtogs par nus kyang chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos de dang de las 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
107a4(mdo 'grel): kun tu rgyu 'tsho byed la/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bus ji skad du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis 'thad pa dang bcas pa bkod pa slob dpon gyis bris pa bzhin ni blta bar bya'o/ /mdo las dper na char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam 'bab pa na zhes bya ba la/ bcom ldan 'das
107a5(mdo 'grel): yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'bram gyi gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/ dge slong dag sems can ma rig pas bsgribs sred pas kun tu sbyor zhing sred pas gtums shing yun ring por 'khor bar
107a6(mdo 'grel): mtshams sbyor zhing sdug bsngal gyi sngon gyi mdza' mi shes pa rnams kyi 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med de/ dper na char gyi rgyun gnya' shing tsam 'bab pa na bar snang la chu'i rgyun 'bab pa rnams kyi bar mtshams med de/ de bzhin du shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig
107a7(mdo 'grel): rten gyi khams chags pa dang/ 'jig pa dang/ gzhan zhig nas 'dug pa dang/ gzhan chags pa dang/ gzhan chags nas gnas pa rnams kyi bar dang mtshams med do/ /de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa
107b1(mdo 'grel): dang chags pa dang/ gzhan 'jig pa dang/ zhig nas 'dug pa dang/ gzhan chags pa dang/ gzhan chags nas gnas pa rnams kyi bar dang mtshams med do/ /dge slong dag sems ma rig pas bsgribs shing sred pas kun tu sbyor bas sred pas gtums te/ yun ring por
107b2(mdo 'grel): 'khor bar mtshams sbyor ba ni sdug bsngal gyi mdza' mi shes pa rnams kyi 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med do/ /dge slong dag de'i phyir/ 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ gang las srid pa chad pa dang/ gang rtogs pas sred pa mngon par mi grub pa de ltar dge slong dag khyed kyis bslab par
107b3(mdo 'grel): bya'o// //'o na tshe dang chos de dag las ma gtags pa'i dmyal ba ma dmigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ 'di skad du kha che ba mdo 'don gyis/ nyi 'og pa rnams ni ma yin pas 'di ni ma rnyed do/ /yang snyigs ma rnam pa lnga mdo de dang de las 'don pa lta
107b4(mdo 'grel): bu ste/ re zhig ji ltar yang dag par ldan pa'i las de'i mdo las btsun pa rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ni bslab pa'i gzhi ches ches nyung ngu dag bcas kyang dge slong rab tu mang po dag dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing gnas la bcom ldan 'das
107b5(mdo 'grel): kyis da ltar ni bslab pa'i gzhi ches mang po bcas kyang dge slong ches nyung ngu dag dgra bcom pa thob cing gnas par gyur/ dga' byed de bzhin no/ /ji ltar da ltar tshe'i snyigs ma dang/ nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang/ dus kyi snyigs pa dang/ lta ba'i snyigs ma dang/
107b6(mdo 'grel): sems can gyi snyigs ma dag gis dga' byed sems can rnams nyams par byas shing dam pa'i chos kyang nub pa'i dus na ston pas nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i bslab pa gzhi ches mang po bcas kyang dge slong ches nyung ngu dag dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing gnas par
107b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo/ /rnam shes gnas pa bdun zhes bya ba la/ bdun las 'phros pa'i bdun pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa brgyad cu pa la sogs pa la blta bar bya'o/ /'di nyid du yang mdzod kyi gnas dang por de las gzhan yang ci rigs par zhes bya ba'i
108a1(mdo 'grel): skabs su skye mched gnyis po zhes bya ba 'grel par bris zin pa dang/ sems can gyi gnas 'chad par 'gyur ba las ming gzhan du byas pa rtogs par bya'o// //mdo las sems can de dag 'di snyam du zhes bya ba la sogs
108a2(mdo 'grel): pa ni mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa 'di nyid du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i skabs su tshangs pa'i dra ba las lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis bshad pa/ ji skad du tshangs pa'i dra ba las zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la sngon gyi mdza' la rnam par rtogs pa rnams kyi dang po'i
108a3(mdo 'grel): gzhi las 'di skad du 'don te/ dge slong dag 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus yod do/ /'jig rten 'jig par gyur pa na sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ yid las byung ba'i gzugs can dbang po ma tshang ba med pa/ yan
108a4(mdo 'grel): lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang dbyibs mdzes pa/ rang gi 'od can nam mkha' la thogs pa med par 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas dang ldan pa tshe ring zhing dus ring por gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag 'jig rten 'di 'chags
108a5(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba'i dus yod de/ 'jig rten 'di 'chags pa na nam mkha' stong pa tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig tshe zad las zad bsod nams zad pas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi
108a6(mdo 'grel): 'phos nas/ tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong pa'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de de na gcig pu zla med cing grogs med par gyur par yun ring zhing dus ring po zhig tu gnas te/ de nas sems can de dus ring por na kye ma bdag dang skal pa mnyam pa'i
108a7(mdo 'grel): sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes na ci ma rung zhes sred pa skye shing mngon par dga' ba yang dag par skyes so/ /sems can de de ltar sems la smon cing gnas pa na sems can de dang skal ba mnyam pa sems can gzhan zhig tshe zad cing
108b1(mdo 'grel): las zad pa bsod nams zad pas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang du skyes par gyur to/ /de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag cig pu zla med cing grogs med pas tshe ring zhing yun ring bar gnas te/ kye ma bdag dang skal ba mnyam pa'i
108b2(mdo 'grel): sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes na ci ma rung zhes dus ring por sred pa skyes shing dga' ba dang yang dag par skyes cing bdag gi sems la de ltar smon pas bdag dang skal ba mnyam pa'i sems can 'dir skyes la sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis sprul pa/ bdag ni sems can 'di
108b3(mdo 'grel): dag gi dbang phyug/ byed pa po/ bsrung ba po/ rab tu 'byin pa po/ dngos po rnams kyi pha lta bur gyur ba po/ sems can de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems can 'di gcig pu zla med cing grogs med par gyur pa tshe ring zhing yun ring por gnas pa sems can de tshe ring zhing yun ring por
108b4(mdo 'grel): gnas te/ kye ma bdag dang skal pa mnyam pa'i sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes na ci ma rung zhes sred pa skyes shing yang dag par dga' ba skyes pas sems can de'i sems la 'di ltar smon pas sems can de dang skal pa mnyam pa bdag cag kyang 'dir skyes shing sems can 'di ni
108b5(mdo 'grel): bdag cag gi sprul pa po/ sems can 'di ni bdag cag gi dbang phyug /byed pa po/ 'byin pa po/ rab tu 'byin par byed pa/ dngos po rnams kyi pha lta bur gyur pa'o zhes 'byung ngo/ /'od gsal gyi lha'i ris de na sems can gang dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la/ bcom ldan 'das yangs
108b6(mdo 'grel): ba can spre'u'i rdzing gi 'gram gyi gtsug lag khang gi nang na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/ dge slong dag 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa mi brtan pa la yid brtan par bya ba ma yin pa yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin pas spang par bya'o//
108b7(mdo 'grel): dge slong dag 'dus byas thams cad la skyo bar bya'o/ /'dod chags dang bral bar bya'o/ /rnam par grol bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i dus yod de dus ring por gyur pa na lha rnams kyi char gyi rgyun mi 'bebs par 'gyur te/ lha rnams kyi char gyi rgyun ma phab pas/ sa
