129a3(mdo 'grel): lte ba zab cing bug med pa dang/ mdog dmar zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba dang/ lto ba 'jam zhing ba spu med la mkhrigs shing rjes su mthun ba dang/ lto ba'i nang 'bar 'bur med cing kun du legs par zlum zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ rtsib logs mnyam par 'jug
129a4(mdo 'grel): cing shas gang la shin du ring ba ma yin la 'jam pa dang/ ro rgyab nub pa ma yin zhing shas gang la cung zad thung la rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar skyes shing ring ba dang/ 'jam pa'i ri mo mtshams 'byor zhing mi mngon pa'i bkod pa dang/ sta zur rgyas shing gang la brtan
129a5(mdo 'grel): cing mtshams 'byor la thugs kha mnyam la mtho zhing rgya che ba dang/ nu ma shin du rags pa ma yin zhing mtho ba dang/ dung ltar g.yas su 'khyil la ri mo shin du phra mo ma yengs par shin du mnyam zhing dmar ba dang/ thugs ka yul shin du skal bas bar
129a6(mdo 'grel): yangs pa dang/ mtshan? khung shas rgyas shing yangs la mtho ba ma yin pa dang/ sku rgyab stong mkhrad zhing rgya che la shas gang zhing tshod mnyam pa dang/ dpung pa glang po che ltar cung zad mi mngon zhing mtshams 'byor la mkhrad zhing 'jam la mnyam pa dang/
129a7(mdo 'grel): 'gram pa mnyam zhing 'jam la ba spu med cing brtan la seng ge'i lta bu dang/ phyag mnyam zhing ring la zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang/ phyag gi ri mo zab cing ma 'dres la mi yo zhing thun tshags med la srab cing zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang/ sor mo'i tshigs
129b1(mdo 'grel): phra zhing ma 'khrugs la dmar pa dang/ mthe chung srin lag las tshang lhag pa dang/ ba spu shin tu mang ba ma yin la phra zhing 'jam la mnyen la rtsa ba 'byor cing mnyam pa dang/ pags pa snum zhing ma 'khums la mnyam pa'i snying po can dang/ pags pa grang ba dang/
129b2(mdo 'grel): tsha ba'i reg pas mdog mi 'gyur ba dang/ sha snum zhing brtan la sdug bsngal ha cang rags pa ma yin zhing/ ha cang phra ba ma yin pa dang/ khrag band+hU dzI ba ka'i me tog lta bu 'am zangs mdog 'dra zhing 'jam la tsan dan gyi dri lta bu dang/ rus pa shas yog cing
129b3(mdo 'grel): brtan la shin du mdzes pa dang/ rus pa'i mtshams klu mdud pa ltar mi mngon pa dang/ sku gdung rdo rje lta mi shigs shing legs par 'dus pa dang/ yan lag shin du rnam par dbyes shing mdzes pa dang/ sku rim par 'tsham zhing rgyas la yongs su dag cing
129b4(mdo 'grel): bzhon sha can dang/ sbrang ba dang/ sme ba dang/ gnag bag med pa dang/ sku la nad kyis byas pa'i nyam chung ba med ba dang/ seng ge gzims cha bsten pas sku rnam par g.yengs pa dang bral ba dang/ pags pa rdul dang dri mas nye bar nyon mongs pa mang cing dag pa
129b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ me dang nor bu dang sman chen po dang/ nyi ma dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od zer dang/ ri rab lta bu rab tu lci ba dang ldan pa dang/ dus su reg na bde ba'i reg pa dang ldan pa dang/ ba spu'i bu ga'i dri 'jam zhing mngar la ku su ma dang/ tsan dan lta bu'i bsung dang ldan ba
129b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ zhal gyi dri utpa la sngon po sar pa lta bu rtag tu 'byung ba dang/ 'che ba med cing 'gram pa ring ba dang/ mnyen zhing gong bu ma yin pa'i dbugs dang/ gsung gi dbyangs zas gcod pa dang/ dman pa za ba dang/ dus yongs su 'gyur ba dang bral zhing
129b7(mdo 'grel): mngon bar gsal ba'i chos 'chad pa dang/ shin tu 'khums pa dang rgya che ba ma yin pa dang/ spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang/ dpe byang yul na gnas shing yongs su gsal zhing rdzogs pa dang/ shin tu yongs su dang ba'i phyir mthong ba rab rib med pa dang/
130a1(mdo 'grel): mgrin pa ha cang ring ba dang ha cang thung ba ma yin zhing gnyer ma gsum gyis rnam par brgyan pa dang/ kos ko? tshang mnyam zhing brtan la yo ba med cing mi ring la rgya che ba dang/ mchu bim+ba? ltar dmang zhing 'jam la mdzes pa dang/ rnyil gyi sha
130a2(mdo 'grel): band+hu dzI ba ka'i me tog ltar 'jam pa dang/ tshems gtsang zhing mnyen la dag cing mdzes pa dang/ mche ba mnyam zhing mtshams 'byor la zlum zhing rno la mnyen pa dang/ dgos pa dang bcad na tshems las g.yas phyogs su 'od zer skad cig gis spro ba dang/
130a3(mdo 'grel): ljags dri ma med cing 'jam la dmar zhing mnyen pa dang/ spyi gtsug glang po che'i spyi bo'i gtsug ltar rno zhing 'jam pa dang/ shangs 'jam zhing mtho ba dang/ /ba spu mi mthug cing 'jam la rtsa ba brtan mnyen la phra ba konda li ka sngon po lta bu dang/ mkhur tshos
130a4(mdo 'grel): ha cang mtho ba dang rno ba ma yin la sha rgyas shing gang ba dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyams pa'i kha dog can dang/ dbral ba'i mtshams legs par dbyes shing dung dang zla ba 'khyil pa lta bu dang/ spyan yangs shing mnyen la 'jam zhing yongs su dag pa dang
130a5(mdo 'grel): rab tu dang zhing ma 'khums pa'i rdzim dang/ mthong la dul zhing dag la mi yo bas khyab pa dang/ shin tu chung ba ma yin pa'i stobs mnga' ba'i phyir mi 'jug pa dang/ smin ma ring ba dang/ gnag pa dang/ 'jam ba dang/ rjes su 'tsham pa dang/ gnyen pa'i dpral
130a6(mdo 'grel): ba gser gyi byang bu dang/ zla ba ltar 'jam zhing yangs pa dang/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa lta bu dang/ dbu sdug cing rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa dang/ gdugs ltar dbu yongs su rgyas pa dang/ dbu skra'i bkod ba 'jam zhing ma 'dzings pa bung
130a7(mdo 'grel): ba ltar mnyen zhing 'jam la rjes su 'brel cing dri bsung mchog dang ldan ba dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ mi dang klu'i 'gro bas spyi gtsug lta bar mi nus pa'o/ /kha che ba rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi sku la dpe byad bzang
130b1(mdo 'grel): po 'jig rten thams cad la bkra shis pa 'byung bar byed pa 'di ltar byed de/ gnas brtan dbyig bshes kyis ji skad du phreng ba dang/ dung dang gdugs dang/ dpal gyi be'u bzang po dang/ lcags kyu dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ mtshon dang/ zla ba dang/ chu dang/ pad+ma
130b2(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis sku rnam par spras pa zhes bshad la/ don 'di nyid yang dag par brjod pa'i phyir ji skad du yang dag pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bde bar gshegs pa'i mtshan bzang po'i 'khor gzhan yang nyon cig /gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lcags
130b3(mdo 'grel): kyu dang/ dpal gyi be'u dang/ mu tig dang/ bum pa dang/ rta dang/ nya dang/ chu srin dang/ rus spal dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ stag dang/ glang po che dang/ ka la pingka dang/ shang shang te'u dang/ khug rta dang/ ne tso dang/ khu byug dang/ ri dwags nag po dang/ rma bya
130b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ ral gri dang/ rdo rje'i yan lag dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po che dang/ mdung dang/ rtse gsum dang/ dgra sta dang/ mnga' dang/ sprin dang/ drag po dang tshangs pa dang/ dbang po dang/ gzhon nu dang/ nyi ma dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ zla ba dang/ mig mi bzang
130b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ nor bdag dang/ yul 'khor skyong dang/ g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang/ pad+ma dang/ ba dan bzang po dang/ me long dang du rba gzhon nu dang/ mu tig dang/ gser dang/ sman chen po dang/ lta'i rnga dang/ drang srong chen po dang/ ba la dang dpung rgyan dang/ sor
130b6(mdo 'grel): gdub dang/ rna cha dang/ seng ge dang/ khyu mchog dang/ me tog dang bcas pa'i shing gi yal ga dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brgyad cu ji skad du brjod pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mtshan nyid stong dang ldan pa mu stegs can rnams
130b7(mdo 'grel): kyang mthong nas 'byor pa'i phyir mngon par dga' ba skye bar byed pa'o/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las kyang mtshan dang dpe byad kyi le'u bzhi bcu dgu pa las 'don pa lta bu ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i
131a1(mdo 'grel): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'du byed thams cad las sems 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
131a2(mdo 'grel): rnams ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba'i phyir sen mo mdog snum pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs rgyud mthon por skyes pa'i phyir sen mo mtho ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
131a3(mdo 'grel): 'das rnams ni tshul kha na mtho ba mi mnga' ba'i phyir sen mo zlum pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yangs shing rgya che ba bsags pa'i phyir sen mo rgyas pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
131a4(mdo 'grel): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis bsags pa'i phyir sen mo byin gyis phra ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang 'tsho ba yongs su bsrungs pa'i phyir rtsa mi mngon pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
131a5(mdo 'grel): 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa las grol ba'i phyir rtsal mdud pa med pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rnams la thugs shin tu mi mngon pa'i phyir long bu mi mngon pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom
131a6(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams ni dka' ba'i gnas thams cad las yongs su sgrol ba'i phyir zhabs mnyam pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge yin pa'i phyir seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas
131a7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po yin ba'i phyir glang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nam mkha' la gshegs pa'i phyir dang pa'i rgyal pa'i stabs su gshegs pa yin no//
131b1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skor phyogs kyi lam dang mthun par gshegs pa'i phyir khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mdzes pa'i phyir mdzes par gshegs pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom
131b2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rtag tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir mi g.yo bar gshegs pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang yon tan yongs su dag pa ston pa'i phyir sku 'khril bag dang bcas pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
131b3(mdo 'grel): rnams ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam par dag pa'i phyir sku byi dor byas pa lta bu dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos go rim bzhin 'chad pa'i phyir sku rim par 'tsham pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku
131b4(mdo 'grel): gsung thugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir sku gtsang ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rang bzhin gyis 'jam pa'i phyir sku 'jam pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir
131b5(mdo 'grel): sku rnam bar dag pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir dpe byad yongs su rdzogs pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mdzes shing rgya che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir sku khog yangs
131b6(mdo 'grel): shing bzang ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la thugs mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam par gshegs pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yin no//
131b7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rab tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir sku 'jam zhing gzhon sha can dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs ma zhum pa'i phyir sku zhum pa med pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
132a1(mdo 'grel): rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba mthon po dang ldan ba'i phyir sku rgyas pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang srid pa'i tshogs yongs su zad pa'i phyir sku shin du grims pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel
132a2(mdo 'grel): par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par spyad pa'i phyir yan lag shin tu rnam par dbyes pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom
132a3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams ni tshul phun sum tshogs pa'i slob ma mnga' ba'i phyir dgu zlum pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i skyon rnam par dag pa'i dku'i skabs phyin pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa'i phyir
132a4(mdo 'grel): dku? ma rnyongs pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rnams zad par mi byed pa'i phyir phyal phyang de ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab pa'i chos rtogs shing khong du chud ba'i phyir lte ba zab pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas
132a5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rjes su mthun zhing gzung bar 'os pa'i slob ma mnga' ba'i phyir lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kun nas mdzes pa'i slob ma'i tshogs mnga' ba'i phyir kun nas mdzes pa dag yin no/ /sangs
132a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin du gtsang ba'i phyir kun du spyod pa gtsang ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba gnag bag med pa ston pa'i phyir sku la smre ba dang gnag bag med pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku shing
132a7(mdo 'grel): bal ltar yangs pa'i chos ston pa brnyes pa'i phyir phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi gnyen gyi tshogs spangs te/ dge sbyong chen po'i dngos po brnyes pa'i phyir phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas
132b1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang spangs par mi 'cha' ba' i phyir phyag gi ri mo zab pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur rtogs pa'i phyir zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba dag yin no/
132b2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnyen pa sngon du 'gro bas 'dul ba'i phyir ljags mnyen pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra mo ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ljags srab pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo
132b3(mdo 'grel): chags pa can rnams kyis rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ljags dmar ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po che'i nga ro dang 'brug gi sgras yongs su mi skrag pa'i phyir glang po che'i nga ro dang 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom
132b4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing mnyen pa 'jam pa brjod pa'i slob ma mnga' ba'i phyir gsung snyan mnyen la 'jam ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid ba'i kun du sbyor ba rnam par log pa'i phyir mchi ba zlum pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
132b5(mdo 'grel): 'das rnams ni skye bo rnon po 'dul ba la mkhas pa'i phyir mche ba rno ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos 'dul ba shin du dkar ba'i phyir mche ba dkar ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnyam pa'i sa'i cha la bzhugs
132b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir mche ba mnyam ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par rtogs pa rim gyis ston pa'i phyir mche ba byin gyis phra ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab mthon po sar zhugs pa'i phyir shangs mtho ba dag
132b7(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gdul bya gtsang ma'i skye po dang ldan pa'i phyir shangs gtsang ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos shin du rgya chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir spyan yangs pa dag yin no/ /sangs
133a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku thams cad kun du stug pa'i phyir rdzi ma stug pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mig dkar nag dbyes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma rangs? pa lta bu'i lha dang lha ma yin dang/ mi gzhon nu
133a2(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis mchog tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir spyan dkar nag dbyes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu mdun phyogs su gzigs pa'i phyir smin chugs ring ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
133a3(mdo 'grel): rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa'i phyir rdzim 'jam pa dag? yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon kun tu mkhyen pa'i phyir smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jam zhing mnyen
133a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i skyo bo'i rgyud 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir smin ma snum pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog du don dang ldan pa mnga' ba'i phyir snyan shal sdug cing snyan zhal ring ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
133a5(mdo 'grel): g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyir snyan mnyan pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gdul bya rgyud mnyam pa mnga' ba'i phyir snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta bar song ba thams cad
133a6(mdo 'grel): yongs su spangs pa'i phyir dpral ba legs par dbyes pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge sbyong dang bram ze dang pha rol rgol ba rnam par gnon pa'i phyir dpral pa'i dbyes che ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
133a7(mdo 'grel): rnams ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir dbu shing du rgyas pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi skye bo la rnam par chags pa log pa'i phyir dbu skra bud ba ltar gnag pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
133b1(mdo 'grel): ni mthong ba dang bsgom pas spangs par bya ba'i phra rgyas spangs pa'i phyir dbu skra stug pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dkar pos ma skyes pa'i bstan pa'i ro dang ldan pa'i phyir dbu skra 'jam pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag
133b2(mdo 'grel): tu ma 'dzings pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'i phyir dbu skra ma 'dzings pa dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu tshig rtsub spangs pa'i phyir dbu skra mi gshor ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo byang chub kyi yan lag gi dri zhim pos
133b3(mdo 'grel): rjes su mthun par 'jug pa'i phyir dbu skra dri zhim ba dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil na dpal gyi be'u dang g.yung drung 'khyil pa mnga' ba'i phyir dpal gyi be'u dang g.yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa dag yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin
133b4(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i sku dpe byad bzang po 'di dag dang ldan no/ /de nyid du gzhan du gnas brtan klu sgrub kyis yi ge gzhan dang tshig 'bru gzhan gyis rnam par bshad de/ ji skad du sangs rgyas yang dag dpe byad brgyad cu bo/ /nga yis rab bshad yid la dad skyed nyon/ /sangs rgyas bcom
133b5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das zhes rab brjod pa/ /sen mo bzangs mdog snum dang sen mo mtho/ /smra mchog rtsi ma mngon zhing rtsa yis ni/ /mdud pa mi mngon long bu mi mngon pa/ /rigs dwags rgyal dang klu yi stabs dag tu/ /rnam par gshegs shing zhabs la mi mnyam med/ /khyu mchog dang ba'i
133b6(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i stabs dang ni/ /g.yas su ldog cing mdzes par gshegs pa dang/ /byi dor byas 'dra rim par 'tsham pa'i sku/ /ma lo ba dang 'khril bag chags pa dang/ /khe? lag yang sa shing bzang dang gzhan yang ni/ /dpe byad yongs su rdzogs dang goms snyoms dang/ /sku zhum med dang
133b7(mdo 'grel): gtsang zhing 'jam pa dang/ /gzhon sha chags shing sku ni rnam par dag /yan lag nying lag shin du rnam dbyes shing/ /thub pa'i dbang po shin du grims pa'i sku/ /gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam bar ni/ /dag cing rab tu rgyas pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /sku ni 'bar 'bur med cing
134a1(mdo 'grel): skabs phyin dang/ phyang de'i phyal dang lte ba'i bug pa zab/ /shin tu kun nas blta na rab mdzes shing/ /lte ba g.yas kyi phyogs su 'khyil ba dang/ /rgyal ba kun du sbyod pa rab gtsang shing/ /sme pa gnag bag smad du med pa dang/ /ljags mnyen
134a2(mdo 'grel): srab cing zhal gyi gzugs brnyan 'char/ /rgyal pa'i zhal ni ha cang ring ba yin/ /glang chen nga ro 'brug gi sgra dang ni/ /mnyam pa'i dbyangs kyi mchog dang ldan pa dang/ /shing bal ltar 'jam shin tu gzhon sha can/ /phyag gi ri mo dmang zhing zab pa dang/ /phyang gi
134a3(mdo 'grel): ri mo yo ba ma yin dang/ /phyag gi ri mo mchog tu yangs pa dang/ /shin tu snyan cing gnyen la 'jam pa'i gsung/ /mche ba zlum zhing mche ba rno ba dang/ /mche ba dgar zhing mchi ba mnyam pa dang/ /thub pa seng ge'i mche ba byin gyis phra/ /tshems ni shin du dkar zhing
134a4(mdo 'grel): gcang ba dang/ /spyan yangs ba dang rdzi ma stug pa dang/ /'jam zhing shin du yangs la mi dkar dang/ /smin ma'i spu ni snum zhing 'jam pa dang/ /snyan shal sdug cing ring la snyan mnyam pa dang/ /bcom ldan snyan gyi dbang po mnyam dang/ /dpral ba shin tu leg
134a5(mdo 'grel): par dbyes pa dang/ /dbu ni rgyas la yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ /dbu skra bud ba snum zhing dri zhim dang/ /dbu skra 'jam zhing yongs su ma 'dzings dang/ /dpal gyi be'u dang g.yung drung 'khyil pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dbu skra rnam par brgyan pa yin/ /gang gis mtshan
134a6(mdo 'grel): rnams gsal byed pa/ /sangs rgyas yang dag dpe byad ni/ /bzang po brgyad cu 'di dag ste/ /bde gshegs thams cad gsal byed yin/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i sku/ /sangs rgyas rjes su mi dran gang/ /'di dang pha
134a7(mdo 'grel): rol gnyis kar nyams/ /gzhan yang slob dpon sna tshogs blo gros kyis ji skad du/ /bdag nyid snod mchog nyid du gzigs nas ni/ /bdag nyid yon gnas nyid du zhal 'ches te/ /'di ltar khyod kyis rtsa mchog tsam yang ni/ /sbyin bdag dbul ba
134b1(mdo 'grel): de yang ma bkag gnad/ /gal te bgros na phyag g.yas brkyang nas ni/ /phyag g.yas rjes su gzung ba'i rjes mthun byed/ /khyod la dpe byad brgyad cus bstod pa yis/ /ji ltar bdag kyang rjes su gzung bar mdzod/ /mnga' bdag khyod kyi sku yi stobs kyi tshang//
134b2(mdo 'grel): gzhal nus 'jig rten gsum na 'ga' mang 'dod/ /gus pa'i rnam pa'i 'byor pa 'di 'dra zhes/ /'phags pa gang phyir bdag 'dra ba yang gnang/ /khyod kyis sor mo ri yi spor gnas pa/ /sen mo zangs kyi mdog 'dra 'od zer can/ /pad+ma rA ga mdzes pa'i zla shar
134b3(mdo 'grel): nas/ /gser gyi rang bzhin snying po mdzes par byas/ /rtse ltar mtho zhing phra la mnyam zhing 'phro/ /dbyangs bcas 'od gsal sen mo mdzes par byas/ /legs skyes utpal dmar po'i 'dab ma ltar/ /lto ba ma grums na chags mnyam zhing mtho/ /steng du sdug
134b4(mdo 'grel): mnyen dpal gyis bsdams pa ltar/ /shin tu gsal ba'i mdangs kyis rnam par mdzes/ /lha mi phyag byed tshe na skad cig la/ /skyes bu 'dul ba'i sen mo me long bzhin/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa mtshan dang dpe byad kyi bstod pa snyan dngags kyi rgyan dang bcas bar stong
134b5(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o/ /gnas brtan thogs med kyis theg pa chen po'i chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa' i sar mtshan dang dpe byad kyi le'u las dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'jig rten dang thun mong du bshad pa ni byad
134b6(mdo 'grel): par du 'phags pa ma brjod pa'i phyir mngon par dad par byed pa ma yin pas mi bzung ngo/ /dpe byad bzang po 'di dag legs pa dang/ legs pa ma yin pa rnam par bzhag pa ni slob dpon go chas byin gyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i phung po rnam par bshad pa
134b7(mdo 'grel): dbugs 'byung ba bzhi par rgyas par bshad pa blta bar bya'o// //dper na rgyal po kri ka'i rmi lam thun bcu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ gser phreng can gyi rtogs pa brjod pa las 'di ltar 'don te/ de nas rgyal po kri ki'i yang dag
135a1(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der nye bar song ste nye bar song nas/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig du 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas yang
135a2(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs pa rgyal po kri kis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa mdang bdag mtshan mo rmi lam na rmi lam thun bcu mthong ste/ btsun pa glang po che chen po skar khung nas byung ba la mjug ma thogs pa dang/ skom pa ma yin pa rnams kyi phyi bzhin
135a3(mdo 'grel): du khron pa bda' ba dang/ phye bre gang dang mu tig bro gang brje ba dang/ tsan dan shing tha mal pa la 'tshod ba dang/ kun dga' ra ba me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs la me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa de thams cad ma byin par len pas phrogs pa dang/ glang po chung
135a4(mdo 'grel): dus spos kyi glang po che bsdigs pa dang/ spre'u mi gtsang ba 'bags pa gzhan la skud pa dang/ spre'u rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang/ snam bu gcig mi bco brgyad kyis bgos la snam bu yang de bzhin du gnas pa dang/ skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'dus te tshig ngan brjod cing
135a5(mdo 'grel): chad pa dang gnod pa byed pa bdag gis mthong ngo/ /mthong nas bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur du 'od zhes bdag rengs shing 'jigs pa dang/ skrag par gyur to/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal
135a6(mdo 'grel): to/ /rgyal po chen po ma 'jigs shig rgyu 'di las khyod rgyal srid las nyams pa dang/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur gyis ma 'jigs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis glang po che skar khung nas byung ba la mjug ma thogs pa mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas zhen/
135a7(mdo 'grel): ma 'ongs pa na skye dgu tshe lo brgya thub pa'i dus na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i nyan thos dag rang gi skye bo gnyen gshes rgya chen po spangs nas rab tu byung ste/ de ltar rab tu byung
135b1(mdo 'grel): nas gtsug lag khang la khyim gyi 'du shes skye bar 'gyur zhing/ de nas ser sna kun du bstan cing lan mang du byas pas lus zhig ste shi pa'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro rnams su ltung zhing skye bar 'gyur ba de'i snga ltas yin no/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis skom pa ma yin pa rnams kyi phyi
135b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin khron pas bda' ba rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas zhe na/ de'i nyan thos dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos ston pa de dag nyan par mi 'dod cing gnas par 'gyur ba de'i snga ltas so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyi phye bre gang dang mu tig bre gang brje ba rmi lam du mthong ba de
135b3(mdo 'grel): ci'i snga ltas zhe na/ de'i nyan thos phyi tshol ba'i phyir dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag gi yan lag la sogs pa'i rin po che yang dag par gsal bar byed de/ de'i snga ltas so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis tsan dan shing tha mal par mthong ba rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga
135b4(mdo 'grel): ltas zhe na/ de'i nyan thos dag lus ma bsgoms pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa dang/ sems ma bsgoms pa dang/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/ lus ma bsgoms pa dang/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa dang/ sems ma bsgoms
135b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ shes rab ma bsgoms pas mu stegs kyi bstan pa 'dzin cing sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab dang mnyam par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i snga ltas so/ /rgyal po chen po khyed kyis kun dga' ra ba me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dag ma byin par len pas phrogs pa rmi
135b6(mdo 'grel): lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas zhe na/ de'i nyan thos khyim la brten te dge 'dun gyi me tog dang 'bras bu btsongs shing btsongs te bzung nas 'tsho ba'i phyir sems pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni de'i snga ltas so/ /rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis glang po chung ngus spos
135b7(mdo 'grel): kyi glang po chen po skrag par byed pa de rmi lam du mthong na de ci'i snga ltas zhe na/ da'i nyan thos tshul khrims 'chal ba sdig pa'i chos can dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ngas gang dag dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa/ des shing dge ba de dag bskrad nas gnas
136a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan na gnas par 'gyur te/ de ni de'i snga ltas so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis spre'u mi gtsang bas spags pa gzhan la skud pa rmis pa de ci'i snga ltas zhe na/ de'i nyan thos sdig pa'i chos can tshul khrims 'chal pa de dag gis dge slong tshul khrims
136a2(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa des shing dge ba'i chos can dag la mi bden pa'i skyon 'gel bar 'gyur te/ de'i snga ltas so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis spre'u rgyal por dbang bskur ba rmis pa de ci'i snga ltas zhe na/ de'i dus na ma ning yang rgyal po byed par 'gyur te/
136a3(mdo 'grel): de'i snga ltas so/ /rgyal po chen po khyod kyis snam bu gcig mi bco brgyad kyis bgos la snam bu yang de bzhin du gnas pa rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas zhe na/ de'i bstan pa kha bco brgyad du gyes par 'gyur la rnam par grol ba'i snam bu ni ral bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i snga
136a4(mdo 'grel): ltas so/ /rgyal po chen po khyed kyis gang skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'dus shing tshig ngan brjod de chad pa dang gnod pa byed pa rmi lam du mthong ba de ci'i snga ltas zhe na/ de'i bstan pa lo stong du gnas shing ngan par smra ba dang chad pa byed pas nub par 'gyur te/ de'i snga ltas yin
136a5(mdo 'grel): te/ de'i phyir khyod rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur gyi rgyal po chen po ma 'jigs shig /de nas rgyal po kri ki yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis dbugs phyung nas mngon par rab tu dad par gyur to zhes 'byung ngo// //
136a6(mdo 'grel): dge slong ma dkar mo yang gos dang bcas par yin te zhes bya ba la/ bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i shing n+ya gra d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas shAkya'i nang na shAkya skyed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ phyug? cing zhes bya ba nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar
136a7(mdo 'grel): byed/ yongs su spyod par byed pa la bu yang med bu mo yang med ces bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang chu lha dang/ rnam thos kyi bu dang khyim gyi lha la sogs pa lha stong phrag du mal gsol ba 'debs par byed kyang bu ma skyes so/ /ji tsam du dus gzhan
136b1(mdo 'grel): zhig na rtse dga' bar byed cing yongs su spyod par byed do/ /de rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ /des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo gal te bu pho skyes na de lta na legs/ 'di ltar bu mo skyes na lhan cig pa skrad bar?
136b2(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /ji tsam na zla ba dbu 'das pa'i 'og tu de'i chung mal bu mo gzugs bzang la mdzes shing blta na sdug pa mi'o kha dog ma thob pa gos dkar pos g.yogs pa mngal gyi nyes pas ma gos pa zhig btsas so/ /ji tsam na chung ma la bu mo btsas pa thos nas khro ba dang bcas pas
136b3(mdo 'grel): nang du zhugs pa dang/ rkang pa lha'i gos kyis dkris pa'i bu mo de byin pa dang/ shAkyas bu mo de mthong nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to/ /de btsas pa'i btsas ston dag byas te ming 'dogs par byed pa na/ kye shes ldan dag bu mo 'di'i ming cing gdags/ gnyen rnams kyis
136b4(mdo 'grel): smras pa gang dag phyir bu mo 'di gos dkar po dang bcas par skyes pa de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming dkar mo zhes gdags so/ /bu mo dkar mo ji lta ji ltar cher skyes pa de lta de ltar gos kyang skye zhing dri ma dang bral bar gyur to/ /de'i lus la rdul dang dri mas mi gos par gyur te//
136b5(mdo 'grel): gang gi tshe bu mo dkar mo rim gyis chen por gyur pa de'i tshe/ de la rgyal po'i bu dang blon po'i bu dang/ phyug po'i bu dag gis slong du 'ongs shing de de dag gis gtses pa dang/ gal te nas? ma byin na bgrang bar 'gyur ro zhes de'i pha lag pa 'gram pa la btang de sems khong du
136b6(mdo 'grel): chud cing 'dug par gyur to/ /ji tsam na bu mos pha sems shing 'dug pa mthong nas/ pha ci zhig sems de la ngas don de dag rgyas par brjod pa dang/ bu mos smros pa/ pha 'di snyad bya ci dgos/ bdag ni 'dod pa don du gnyer ba ma yin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
136b7(mdo 'grel): rab tu byung gis pa mkhyen pa mdzod cig /de ji srid du pha dang mas gnang nas rab tu byung ste/ gos gang gis dkris te skyes pa de nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos go ba? lnga par gyur to/ /des sbyor zhing brtson pa dang 'dun cing 'bad pas rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor
137a1(mdo 'grel): ba 'di nyid rab tu rig nas 'khor ba'i 'du byed thams cad rdul ba ring? lhung ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba dang 'jigs pa'i chos can spangs te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs shing khams gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba gser? dang bde? ba/
137a2(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' dang lag mthil/ tsan dan dang ste'u ru mtshungs shing rig pa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i spobs pa can rnyed pa dang bkur sti la kha phyir phyogs pa lta'i dbang pos mchod cing gus par bya ba dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas
137a3(mdo 'grel): the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dkar mos las ci zhig byas nas gang gis na phyug po'i rigs su skyes shing gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa dang blta na sdug par gyur/ ci zhig byas pas na gos dkar pos dkris bzhin
137a4(mdo 'grel): du skyes shing dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dkar mo nyid kyis skye ba snga ma la las byas shing bsags la so sor thob par byas pa nu? pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa ste/ gzhan gyis byas shing
137a5(mdo 'grel): bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu dang me dang rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur gyi/ 'on kyang las byas shing bsags
137a6(mdo 'grel): pa ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ lus can dag gis las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chung mi zad/ /tshogs shing bus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu rab tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/
137a7(mdo 'grel): bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu rnams tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyis ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
137b1(mdo 'grel): 'od srungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de ba ra NA se'i grong khyer drang srong smra ba ri dags kyi nags na brten cing bzhugs so/ /ji tsam na phyug po'i chung ma dang dad pa can rang bzhin bzang zhing dge pa'i bsam pa can zhig /bya ba 'ga' zhig gis phyir drang srong sma ba ri
137b2(mdo 'grel): dwags kyi nags su 'ongs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyos bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par brgyan pa nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i gzi brjid can byon pa/ rin po che'i ri bo lta bu'i 'od zer kun
137b3(mdo 'grel): nas 'bar ba dang bcas zhing blta bar bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das des mthong nas zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis chos bstan
137b4(mdo 'grel): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol nas dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos phul te/ rim gyis pha dang mas rjes su gnad nas bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu
137b5(mdo 'grel): byung ngo/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ phyug po'i chung ma de nyid dge slong ma dkar mo yin no/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun la spra? brgyad gi chos gos phul bas gos dkar pos dkris bzhin du skyes shing tshangs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs shing yongs su bsrungs
137b6(mdo 'grel): pa des na skye ba bcom zhing dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu ba zhes pa yin zhing/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma
137b7(mdo 'grel): yin pa de'i phyir dge slong dag las gcig tu gnas pa'i las rnams dang/ 'dren ma rnams spang bar bya zhing/ gcig tu dkar ba'i las rnams yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong dag bcom ldan 'das
138a1(mdo 'grel): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang ngo// //bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba la/ bzhi las 'phros pa'i
138a2(mdo 'grel): sgo lnga pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i mdo las bsam par bya ba rnam gnyis te bshad pa dang/ 'di nyid du yang go rim las bzlog pa'i mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par bshad pa lta bu'o// //btags pa las
138a3(mdo 'grel): 'di skad du zhes bya ba la/ mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa dbang po'i rnam par bshad pa phra rgyas btags pa la bshad pa bzhin no// //pha ma'i nur nur po'i mi gtsang ba las skyes zhes bya ba la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /de nas
138a4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/ dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ 'di na sprul gdug pa gzi brjid drag pa dug drag pa bzhi sgrom gcig gi nang du bcug par gyur cing/ de nas skyes bu byis pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa/ rmongs pa
138a5(mdo 'grel): ma yin zhing yang dag pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa bde ba 'dod cing sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa 'tsho bar 'dod cing/ 'tsho ba dang rjes su mthun pa 'ga' zhig 'ongs te/ de la gzhan kha cig gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye skyes bu sprul gdug pa gzi
138a6(mdo 'grel): brjid drag cing dug drag pa bzhi sgrom gcig gi nang du bcug cing khyod kyis de la dus dus su byug par bya/ dus dus su khrus bya zhing/ dus dus su zas sbyin par bya zhing/ dus dus su yang dag par bde ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ /kye skyes bu gang gi tshe
138a7(mdo 'grel): sprul gdug pa gzi brjid brag cang dug drag pa bzhi po 'di dag las gang yang rung ba zhig khros par gyur na de'i rgyus khyod 'chi ba 'am 'chi ba la thug pa tsam gyi sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /kye skyes bu khyod bdag nyid kyi bya ba gang
138b1(mdo 'grel): yin pa de byos shig ces smras na/ de nas skyes bu de sprul gdug pa gzi brjid che zhing dug drag pa bzhi sgrom gyi nang du bcug pas 'jigs nas/ gang gis na myur ba myur bar 'bros par byed pa na skyes bu gzhan zhig gis kye skyes bu khyod phyi phyi bzhin du bdar 'ong gis
138b2(mdo 'grel): des khyod la gnod pa 'am gnod par 'gyur gyis kye skyes bu khyod rang gi bya ba gang yin pa de byos shig ces smras pa dang/ de nas skyes bu de sprul gdug pa gzi brjid che zhing dug drag pa bzhi sgrom gcig gi nang du bcug pa dang/ gshed ma'i skyes bu lag
138b3(mdo 'grel): na ral gri thogs pa lngas rab tu 'jigs te gang gi na myur ba myur bar 'bros pa na/ skyes bu gzhan zhig gis skyes bu gshed ma'i kye skyes bu drug pa zhig gis phyi nas snyeg cing phyi nas nye bar 'ongs zhing 'dug gis/ nges khyod kyi mgo drungs nas bcad de
138b4(mdo 'grel): sa la bsgyur bar 'gyur gyis/ kye skyes bu khyod rang gi bya ba gang yin pa de byos shig ces smras pa dang/ sprul gdug pa gzi brjid che ba bzhi sgrom gcig gi nang du bcug pa dang/ gshed ma'i skyes bu lag na ral gri thogs pa lnga dang/ gshed ma'i skyes
138b5(mdo 'grel): bu drug pa drung na nye ba de dag gis shin tu 'jigs te myur ba myur ba 'bros pa dang/ des na grong pa zhig mthong ngo/ /de grong stong pa der zhugs te/ ji srid du khang pa stong pa der bltas pa na stong pa 'ba' zhig mthong ste/ rdzun pa nyid dang/ bslu ba nyid dang
138b6(mdo 'grel): snying po med pa nyid mthong zhing gang gnod pa mthong ba de dag kyang brdzun pa dang/ bslu ba dang/ snying po med par mthong ba la skyes bu gzhan zhig 'di skad ces/ kye skyes bu khang pa stong pa 'dir grong la gnod pa'i rkun ma 'byung bar 'gyur gyis nges khyod
138b7(mdo 'grel): bzung nas rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du srog dang phral bar 'gyur gyis/ kye'i skyes bu khyod rang gi bya ba gang yin pa de byos shig ces smras pa dang/ de nas skyes bu de sprul gdug pa bzhi zhes bya bas/ gshed ma'i skyes bu drung na nye ba dang/
139a1(mdo 'grel): grong stong pa la gnod pa'i rkun ma dag gis rab tu 'jigs te myur bar myur bar bros pa na des de na chu bo chen po ri las 'bar ba'i chu bo rgyun ring zhing gting zab par myur bar 'gro zhing khyer bar bya ba khyer bar byed pa tshu rol gyi
139a2(mdo 'grel): dogs dogs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung bar gyur cing/ pha rol gyi dogs zhi zhing bde ba grub pa dang/ bde ba dang bcas pa de tshu rol gyi dogs las pha rol gyi dogs su rgol bar byed par gru 'am rdzings med par
139a3(mdo 'grel): gyur cing/ de lta bu'i chu bo chen po ri las 'bab pa'i chu bo rgyus ring zhing gting zab myur bar 'gro zhing khyer bar bya ba khyer bar byed pa tshu rol gyi dogs dogs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung bar
139a4(mdo 'grel): gyur cing/ pha rol gyi dogs zhi zhing bde ba grub pa dang bde ba dang bcas pa 'di las chu las pha rol tu brgal bar byed pa gru 'am/ rdzings gang dag gis rtswa 'am shing dam yal ga dang 'dab ma dag bsdus te gzigs su zhugs shing/ gzings la brten
139a5(mdo 'grel): te lag pa dang/ rkang ba'i rtsol ba brtsam par bya'o zhes de snyam du bsams nas/ rtsa dang shing dang 'dab ma dang lo ma dag phyogs gcig tu bsdus te/ gzings 'chid bar byed do/ gzings bcings te/ gzings la zhugs shing gzings
139a6(mdo 'grel): la brtan gzings la gnas te/ lag pa dang rkang pa'i rtsol ba rtsom par byed de/ ji ltar lag pa dang rkang pa'i rtsal brtsom par byed pa de ltar sgrom spangs shing sprul gdug pa gzi brjid che zhing dug drag pa bzhi sgrom gcig gi nang du
139a7(mdo 'grel): bcug pa spangs par gyur cing/ gshed ma'i skyes bu lag na ral gri thogs pa spangs par gyur cing/ gshed ma'i skyes bu drug pa drung na nye bar spangs shing/ khang pa stong pa spangs shing/ grong 'joms pa'i rkun ma spangs par gyur cing
139b1(mdo 'grel): chu bo chen po ri las 'ba' cing rgyun ring la gting zab pa myur bar 'gro zhing khyer bar bya ba khyer bar byed pa ring du spangs par gyur cing/ tshu rol gyi dogs dogs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba spangs shing ring du
139b2(mdo 'grel): byas par 'gyur zhing/ pha rol gyi dogs zhi zhing bde ba dang grub pa dang bde legs su brgal nas pha rol du phyin te tshangs shing gnas so/ /dge slong dag 'di ni ji srid du don shes par bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa yin gyi/ 'di'i don ni gzhan du blta bar bya
139b3(mdo 'grel): ste/ dge slong dag sgrom zhes bya ba ni lus kyi tshig bla dags te/ gzugs can rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa/ pha dang ma'i mi gtsang ba nur nur po las brten te skyes pa/ 'bras chan dang zan don gyis gsos pa/ rtag par rgyun du brdzun
139b4(mdo 'grel): pa bslu ba yongs su 'jig pa'i chos can gyi tshig bla dags so/ /sprul gdug pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i tshig bla dags so/ /de bzhi gang zhe na/ sa dang/ chu dang/ me dang/ rlung ngo/ /dge slong dag sa'i khams 'khrugs na yang 'chi ba 'am mchi
139b5(mdo 'grel): ba la thug pa tsam gyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /gshed ma'i skyes bu lag na ral gri thogs pa lnga zhes bya ba ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i tshig bla dags so/ /gshed ma'i skyes bu drug pa drung na nye ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyi tshig bla dags so//
139b6(mdo 'grel): grong stong pa zhes bya ba ni nang gi bdag nyid kyi skye mched rnams kyi tshig bla dags so/ /dge slong dag dge slong rigs kyi bu mig la stong pa nyid du blta bar byed cing dge slong dag rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid la rigs kyi bu de lta bas na
139b7(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid du mthong bar 'gyur zhing rdzun pa nyid dang/ bslu ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur zhing/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu mig la shin du rdzun pa dang/ bslu ba dang/ gsog dang/ snying po med par mthong bar 'gyur zhing/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu rna ba dang
140a1(mdo 'grel): sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid la shin tu rdzun pa dang/ bslu ba dang/ gsog dang snying po med pa nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /grong 'joms pa'i rkun po zhes bya ba ni phyi'i skye mched rnams kyi tshig bla dags te/ gzugs
140a2(mdo 'grel): yid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong bas mig 'joms par byed do/ /rna ba sgras sna dres lce ros/ lus reg byas dge slong dag yid ni chos nyid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba rnams kyis 'joms par byed do/ /dge slong dag chu bo chen po zhes bya ba ni chu bo bzhi po 'dod pa'i chu bo dang/ srid
140a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i chu bo dang/ lta ba'i chu bo dang/ ma rig pa'i chu bo'i tshig bla dags so/ /dge slong dag rgyun ring po zhes bya ba ni srid pa gsum po 'dod pa'i srid pa dang/ gzugs kyi srid pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i srid pa gsum gyi tshig bla dags so/ /tshu rol gyi 'gram dogs
140a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang bcas pa 'jig pa dang bcas pa 'jig pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i tshig bla dags so/ /pha rol gyi 'gram zhi zhing bde ba grub pa dang bde ba bcas pa zhes bya ba ni phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das
140a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshig bla dags so/ /gzings zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi tshig bla dags so/ /lag pa dang rkang pa'i rtsol ba rtsom pa zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i tshig bla dags so/ /pha rol tu phyin cing brgal la tshangs shing gnas so zhes
140a6(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dags so/ /dge slong dag nyan thos rnams kyi dran par bya'o zhes bya ba nas/ 'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/ /kun dga' bo la gdams
140a7(mdo 'grel): pa las kyang kun dga' bo gdams pa 'di ltar 'don? te/ sring mo lus zhes bya ba ni lus kyi tshig bla dags te/ gzugs can rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa pha'i mi gtsang ba nur nur po las skyes pa 'bras chan dang zan don gyis skyed cing rtag
140b1(mdo 'grel): tu 'dul zhing yongs su nyams pa 'jig cing rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi tshig bla dags so/ /de bzhin du gzhan las kyang ngo/ /dge slong dag khyed kyis yun ring por zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can
140b2(mdo 'grel): spre'u rdzing gi gtsug khang du bzhugs te/ de nas lam du gnas pa bzhi bcu po thams cad kyang dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyis mi len pa/ slob pa 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar 'ongs te/ nye
140b3(mdo 'grel): bar 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dge slong lam du gnas pa bzhi bcu pa 'di dag thams cad kyang dgan pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyis mi len pa/ slob pa
140b4(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba dag yin la/ gang bdag gis 'di dag 'di na 'dug bzhin du ji ltar nye bar len pa med par zag pa dag las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom
140b5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis dge slong bzhi bcu'i tshogs la bos te/ dge slong dag sems can thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i 'khor bar ma rig pas bsgribs shing sred pa kun tu sbyor bas/ sred pas bcings pa yun ring po nas 'khor bar nying mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor
140b6(mdo 'grel): ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi mngon gyi mdza' mi shes so/ /dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di ltar chu bo gang+gA gang nas 'bab pa rgya mtsho chen po gang du 'jug pa de'i bar gyis gang+gA'i chu mang ngam/ gang yang khyed cag gi yun ring po'i dus na 'khor bar
140b7(mdo 'grel): nying mtshams sbyor ba'i khrags zags par gyur pa med/ btsun pa ji ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ 'di ltar chu bo chen po gang+gA gang nas 'bab pa dang/ rgya mtsho chen po gang du 'jug pa de'i bar gyi gang+gA'i
141a1(mdo 'grel): chu bas bdag cag gi yun ring por 'khor bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i khrag 'dzag pa nyid ches mang ngo/ /dge slong dag legs so legs so/ /'di ltar chu bo gang+gA gang nas 'bab pa dang/ rgya mtsho chen po gang du 'jug pa de'i bar gang+gA'i
141a2(mdo 'grel): chu bas khyod cag gi yun ring por 'khor bar nying mtshams sbyor pa'i khrag zags par gyur pa ches mang ngo/ /dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di ltar chu bo gang+gA'i gang nas 'bab pa dang/ rgya mtsho chen gang du 'jug pa de'i bar gyi gang+gA'i chu dang/ gang yang shar
141a3(mdo 'grel): phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po dang/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu mang ngam/ gang yang khyed cag gi yun ring por 'khor bar nying mtshams zag pa mang/ btsun pa ji ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis
141a4(mdo 'grel): bshad pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na 'di ltar na 'di ltar chu bo gang+gA gang nas 'bab pa dang/ rgya mtsho chen po gang du 'jug pa de'i bar gyis gang+gA'i chu dang/ gang yang shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po dang/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho
141a5(mdo 'grel): chen po bzhi'i chu bas bdag cag gi yun ring por 'khor bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i khrag zags par gyur pa ches mang ngo/ /dge slong dag legs so legs so/ /'di ltar chu bo gang+gA gang nas 'bab pa dang/ rgya mtsho chen pho gang du 'jug pa de'i bar gyi gang+gA'i
141a6(mdo 'grel): chu bo dang/ gang yang shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po dang/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu bos khyed cag gi yun ring bar 'khor bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i khrag zegs par gyur pa 'di nyid ches mang de//
141a7(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag khyed cag lun ring por glang po che dang/ skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ glang po cher gyur cing lag pa bcad pa nyams su myong ba dang/ rkang ba bcad pa dang/ rna ba bcad pa dang/ mgo bcad pa dang/ so 'don pa lan du mar
141b1(mdo 'grel): nyams su myong bar gyur cing/ lan du mar khrag zags par gyur to/ /dge slong dag khyed cag khyi dang/ snga mo dang/ ba lang dang/ bong bu dang/ ra dang/ ri dags dang/ ma he dang/ phag dang/ khyim bya rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing khyim byar gyur te/ lag pa
141b2(mdo 'grel): bcad pa nyams su myong ba dang/ rkang pa bcad pa dang/ rna ba bcad pa dang/ mgo bo bcad pa dang/ mchu gcod par gyur pa'i sdug bsngal du ma nyams su myang bar gyur cing lan mang du khrag zags par gyur to/ /dge slong dag khyad cag yun ring por rkun mar gyur te
141b3(mdo 'grel): bzung ba dang/ mi gzhan gzhan gyis bzung ba 'phrog pa dang/ gzhan 'chid ba dang/ rgyun gcod pa dang/ bcings ba 'grol ba dang/ chom rkun pa dang/ grod 'jams pa dang/ grong khyer 'joms pa dang/ yul 'jams pa dang/ ljongs 'jams pa yin no zhes
141b4(mdo 'grel): bzung ba dang/ der lan du mar lag pa bcad pa nyams su myong zhing/ rkang pa bcad pa dang/ rna ba bcad pa dang/ sna bcad pa dang/ mgo bo bcad pa nyams su myong zhing der lan du mar khrag zags par gyur te/ /dge slong dge slong dag khyed kyis yun ring por
141b5(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal drag pa tsha ba rtsub pa yongs su myong zhing dur khrod ba skyed do/ /khrag gi thigs pa blangs so/ /lan cig ma yin par dmyal ba dang/ lan cig ma yin par dud 'gro dang/ lan cig ma yin par yi dags dang/ lan cig ma yin par ngan song ngan
141b6(mdo 'grel): 'gro log par ltung bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag gzugs rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa yin snyam sems/ btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'o/ /gang mi rtag pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nam/ btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'o/ /gang mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yongs
141b7(mdo 'grel): su 'gyur ba'i chos can de la 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag go? 'di ni bdag ste/ 'di ni bdag gi'o zhes bdag du khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma legs so/ /dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/
142a1(mdo 'grel): 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa yin snyam du sems/ btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'o/ /gang mi rtag pa de sdug bsngal ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ btsun pa sdug bsngal ba/ gang mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal
142a2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can de la 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag go /'di ni bdag ste/ 'di ni bdag gi'o zhes bdag khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so/ /dge slong dag de'i phyir gzugs gang 'das pa 'am
142a3(mdo 'grel): ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ dman pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ thag nye ba 'am/ rgyang ring ba 'am/ de thams cad la 'di ni bdag gi ma yin no/ /'di ni bdag ma yin te/ bdag gi bdag med de
142a4(mdo 'grel): zhes 'di ltar yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis lta bar bya'o/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa gang cung zad 'das pa'am/ ma 'das pa 'am/ da lta 'byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ rags pa'am/ phra ba'am/ dman pa'am
142a5(mdo 'grel): gya nom pa 'am/ thag nye ba 'am/ rgyang ring ba de? thams cad la 'di ni bdag gi ma yin zhing bdag ma yin no/ /'di ni bdag gi ma yin no zhes 'di ltar yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin blta bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag de ltar mthong ba'i 'phags pa
142a6(mdo 'grel): nyan thos pa dang ldan pa gzugs la yid 'byung zhing ma tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa la yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yid byung nas 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod chags dang bral nas grol bar 'gyur ro/ /grol nas
142a7(mdo 'grel): bdag gi skye ba zad do/ /tshangs par spyod pa bsten to/ /bya ba byas so/ /yang srid pa mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong bzhi bcu'i tshogs rnams nye bar len pa med par zag pa
142b1(mdo 'grel): dag las sems rnam par grol lo zhes gsungs so// //dmyal ba yi ni spyi'u tshugs yin zhes bya ba la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams labs te/ dge slong dag yongs su gdung ba dang
142b2(mdo 'grel): bcas pa dang/ yongs su gdung ba med pa'i chos bstan par bya yi de legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang bshad par bya'o/ /yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa'i chos gang yin zhe na/ dge slong dag skyes pa 'am bur med tshul khrims 'chal ba ? ?
142b3(mdo 'grel): chos can gang lus kyi nyes par spyod pa 'am/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar 'gyur te/ de'i dus na nad kyis thebs shing sdug bsngal zhing na lam la stan la 'jug cing khri dang stan gyi stong na 'dug pa la lus kyi tshor ba sdug bsngal
142b4(mdo 'grel): ba drag pa tshab rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog par byed pa rnams kyis reg pa na gang yang de 'di ltar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi lus kyi nyes par spyad pa dang/ ngag gi nyes par spyad pa dang yid kyi nyes par spyad pa de'i tshe de'i dus na mngon du 'gyur zhing ches gsal
142b5(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste nyi ma nub pa'i dus na ri'am ri'i bang rim gyi grib ma sa la lhags par gyur/ rab tu lhags par gyur/ ches gsal bar lhags pa de bzhin du/ de 'di ltar gang gi tshe sngon gyi lus kyi nyes par spyad pa dang/ dag gi nyes par
142b6(mdo 'grel): spyad pa dang/ yid kyi nyes par spyad pa de'i tshe de'i dus na mngon sum du 'gyur te/ rab tu mngon du 'gyur zhing ches gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /de 'di snyam du kye ma 'di ltar bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sdig pa byas te/ sdig pa byas so/ /drag po byas so//
142b7(mdo 'grel): nyes pa byas so/ /bsod nams ma byas so/ /dge ba ma byas shing 'jigs pa la mi 'jigs pa'i skyabs ma byas pas pha rol du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes 'gyod pa dang bcas par 'gyur te/ 'gyod pa dang bcas te shi ba ni legs pa ma yin zhing dus byed pa
143a1(mdo 'grel): dang pha rol du 'gro ba ni legs pa ma yin no/ /'di ni 'gyod pa yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /yongs su gdung ba med pa'i chos gang zhe na/ dge slong dag skyes pa 'am bud med tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i
143a2(mdo 'grel): chos can gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang/ ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang/ yid kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar 'gyur te/ de'i dus na nad kyis thebs shing sdug bsngal zhing na la mal stan la 'dug cing khri dang stan gyi
143a3(mdo 'grel): steng na 'dug pa la lus kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal ba drag pa tsha brtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog par byed pa rnams kyis reg pa na gang yang de 'di ltar 'gyur te/ sngon lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang/ dag gis legs par spyad pa dang/ yid
143a4(mdo 'grel): kyis legs par spyad pa de'i tshe na mngon du 'gyur zhing/ rab tu mngon du 'gyur la/ ches gsal bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ nyi ma nub pa'i dus na ri 'am ri'i bang rim gyi grib ma sa la lhags par gyur/ rab tu lhags par 'gyur ches gsal
143a5(mdo 'grel): bar lhags pa de bzhin du de 'di ltar gang gi mngon lus kyis las legs par spyad pa dang/ ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang/ yid kyis legs par spyad pa de'i tshe de'i dus na mngon du 'gyur te/ rab tu mngon du 'gyur zhing ches gsal bar
143a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /de 'di snyam du kye ma bdag gis 'di ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dge ba byas te/ sdig pa drag po ma byas so/ /bsod nams byas so/ /dge ba byas shing 'jigs pa la mi 'jigs pa'i skyabs bya ste 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro
143a7(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ro zhes 'gyod pa med par 'gyur te/ 'gyod pa med par shi ba ni legs shing dus byed pa dang pha rol tu 'gro ba ni legs pa yin te/ 'di 'gyod pa yongs su gdung ba med pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag yongs su gdung ba
143b1(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa dang/ yongs su gdung ba med pa'i chos bshad par bya'o zhes ji skad du bshad pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do/ /'gyod pa dang bcas mi rnams kyi/ /'tsho ba shin tu dka' bar gnas/ /mi de rnams kyi 'gro ba dag/ gang du
143b2(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba legs par nyon/ /yang sos dang ni thig nag dang/ /bsdus 'joms du 'bod gnyis dang ni/ /tsha dang rab tu tsha ba dang/ /mnar med pa zhes bya ba ste/ /de ltar de dag dmyal ba ni/ /brgyad ces bya ste rgal bar dka' / /drag po'i las kyis kun tu
143b3(mdo 'grel): gang/ /re re la yang lhag bcu drug /rtsig pa bzhi dang sgo bzhi dang/ rnam phya ris su chad pa yin/ /lcags kyi ra bas kun nas bskor/ /lcags dag gis ni gang ba yin/ /de nas lcags 'bar sa gzhi ste/ /'bar ba'i me dang ldan pa yin/ /dpag tshad stong
143b4(mdo 'grel): phrag du mar ni/ /me lce dag gis khyab par gnas/ /ser sna can rnams 'dul byed pa'i/ /me lce'i sgra ni bsgrub par dka' / /'joms shing ba spu ldang ba dang/ /'jigs par byed cing sdug bsngal byed/ /yang dag sdom dang dka' thub can/ /drang srong rnams
143b5(mdo 'grel): la skur 'debs pa/ /de dag spyi'u tshugs dag tu ni/ /dmyal bar ltung ba dag tu 'gyur/ /'tshed bzhin pa yi nya bzhin du/ /de dag drag pos 'joms shing 'tshed/ /mtshon gyis bcom pa'i slu bzhin du/ /de dag rtag tu smre sngags 'don/ /'di ltar nyes
143b6(mdo 'grel): par spyod pa rnams/ /'o dod chen po smre sngags 'don zhes bka' stsal to// //mngal du 'jug pa gsum dag zhes bya ba/ gleng bzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/ dge slong dag
143b7(mdo 'grel): mngal du 'jug pa ni rnam pa gsum ste/ shes bzhin du ma'i mngal du 'jug pa dang/ shes bzhin du gnas pa dang/ 'byung ba shes bzhin ma yin pa dang/ ma'i mngal du 'jug pa shes bzhin du ma yin gyi/ gnas pa dang/ 'jug pa shes bzhin
144a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ ma'i mngal du 'jug pa dang/ 'byung ba dang/ gnas pa yang shes bzhin du gnas pa yod do zhes gsungs so/ /'di rgyas pa ni phra rgyas btags pa'i dbugs 'byung ba drug pa las blta bar bya'o// //
144a2(mdo 'grel): 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis las ni yod pa rnam par smin pa ni yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ bcom ldan 'das skyabs seng gi grong khyer kalma sha daM min bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/ dge slong
144a3(mdo 'grel): dag thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ /tshig 'bru bzang po/ /ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba tshangs par spyod pa/ gsal bar byed pa/ 'di lta ste/ don dam pa/ stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam
144a4(mdo 'grel): grangs bstan par bya yis de legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang bshad par bya'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ mi skye ba na gang nas kyang mi 'ong/ 'gag pa gang du mi 'gro ste/ dge slong dag 'di ltar mig ni
144a5(mdo 'grel): ma byung ba las byung zhing byung nas kyang yongs su 'jigs pa ste las ni yod do/ /rnam par smin pa ni yod do/ /chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa phung po 'di 'dor bar byed cing phung po gzhan nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa po ni mi dmigs so/ /
144a6(mdo 'grel): de la chos su brdar brtags pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung/ 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs
144a7(mdo 'grel): ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis
144b1(mdo 'grel): rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung/ 'di ma skyes pas 'di 'gag par
144b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /
144b3(mdo 'grel): reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gag pas len pa 'gag /len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/
144b4(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs so/ /dge slong dag thog mar dge ba/ bar
144b5(mdo 'grel): du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ /ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba/ tshangs par spyod pa/ yongs su gsal bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o zhes
144b6(mdo 'grel): ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do zhes bka' stsal to// //dang po nur nur po yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+har ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te gnod sbyin dbang po'i khyim du mtshan mo gnas pa'i phyir
144b7(mdo 'grel): gshegs so/ /de nas gnod sbyin dbang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar 'ongs te/ nye bar 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyog byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas gnod sbyin dbang pos tshigs su
145a1(mdo 'grel): bcad ba 'di skad ces gsol to/ /srog gis ci zhig mi shes sam/ /srog gis ci zhig mi rtogs sam/ /srog ni gang du bcings shing gnas/ /srog gi 'ching ba ci zhig yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /srog gis
145a2(mdo 'grel): gzugs rnams mi shes te/ /'du byed kyang ni rtogs ma yin/ /srog ni lus 'dir bcing shing gnas/ /srog ni 'ching ba sred pa yin/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni srog min gsung/ /ji ltar chang tshing 'dir gnas shing/ /ji ltar rim gyis gong bur 'gyur//
145a3(mdo 'grel): ji ltar lus 'di mngon 'phel 'gyur/ /dang po nur nur po yin no/ /nur nur po las mer mer po/ /mer mer po las nar nar skye/ /nar nar po las mkhrang 'gyur skye/ /mkhrang nas rkang lag 'byung ba dang/ /skra spu sen mo la sogs dang/ /dbang po gzugs
145a4(mdo 'grel): can rnams dang ni/ /mtshams rnams rim gyis skye bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe ma yin bzas pa dang/ /btung ba gnyis ka longs spyad pas/ /mngal gyi nang na gnas pa'i mi/ /des ni gsol zhing skye bar 'gyur/ /de nas gnod sbyin dbang po bcom ldan
145a5(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo// //'di ltar gleng gzhi chen po'i rnam grangs las zhes bya ba
145a6(mdo 'grel): la mdor bstan pa brjod pa las 'di ltar 'don te/ kun dga' po ming dang gzugs la rkyen yod dam zhes 'dri na/ /rkyen yod da zhes lan gdab par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gang yin zhes 'dri na/ rnam par shes pa rkyen yin no
145a7(mdo 'grel): zhes brjod par bya'o/ /kun dga' bo rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs so zhes ngas ji skad du bstan rgyas par rab tu bshad do/ /kun dga' bo gal te rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs par ma gyur na/ khu ba dang khrag gi nur nur
145b1(mdo 'grel): po'i nang du mngon par brgyal bar 'gyur ram/ btsun pa ma lags so/ /kun dga' bo gal te rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du zhugs par ma gyur ram/ 'phos par ma gyur na rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ram/ btsun pa ma lags so//
145b2(mdo 'grel): kun dga' bo gal te byis ba dang/ gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma dang/ lang tsho'i gnas skabs kyis rnam par shes pa dang po nas 'di ltar chad? cing ma byung bar gyur na ming dang gzugs 'di ltar rgyas shing yang ba rgya chen por 'gyur ram/ btsum? pa ma lags so//
145b3(mdo 'grel): kun dpa' bo gal te rnam pa thams cad du rnam par shes pa med na ming dang gzugs gdags par nus sam/ btsun pa ma lags so/ /kun dga' bo gal te rnam pa thams cad du rnam par shes pa med na ming dang gzugs gdags par nus sam/
145b4(mdo 'grel): btsun ba ma lags so/ /kun dga' bo de'i phyir rgyu mtshan 'di dang/ rgyu 'di dang/ kun 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i crkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes nges? ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas bar
145b5(mdo 'grel): rab tu bshad do/ /'di ltar mdo de nyid las dge slong dag dge slong gis gang phan chad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod? pa na'o/ /dge slong dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang/ rten cing 'brel par
145b6(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba'i chos rnams bshad par bya yis de legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang bshad bar bya'o/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di yod pas 'di 'byung/ 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen
145b7(mdo 'grel): gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba nas/ 'di 'ba' zhig kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ba 'di ni chos nyid do/ /chos rnams
146a1(mdo 'grel): kyi chos nyid 'di ni rtag tu gnas pa'o zhes rang nyid kyi mngon par shes pas mkhyen cing mngon par sangs rgyas nas ston par byed/ 'chad par byed/ rab tu 'chad par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ 'grel bar byed/ rgyas par byed/ ston
146a2(mdo 'grel): cing yang dag par gsal bar byed de/ 'di ltar skye pa'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang/ srid pa dang/ len pa dang/ sred pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ reg pa dang/ skye mched drug dang/ ming dang gzugs dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams te/
146a3(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung ngam ma byung yang rung chos nyid de/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni rtag tu gnas so zhes de bzhin gshegs pas rang nyid kyi mngon par shes pas mkhyen nas mngon par sangs rgyas nas ston par byed/ 'chad par byed/
146a4(mdo 'grel): rab tu 'chad par byed rnam par 'byed par byed/ 'grel bar byed/ rgyas par byed/ bsten cing yang dag par gsal bar byed de/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni chos rnams kyi gnas pa/ chos rnams kyi nges pa/ chos
146a5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi ji lta ba nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ mi 'gyur ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ji lta ba/ bden pa/ de kho na nyid/ ji lta ba bzhin mi 'gyur ba/ phyin ci ma log pa/ rkyen 'di tsam pa ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba go rim las
146a6(mdo 'grel): zlog pa ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ ma rig pa dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ ming dang gzugs dang/ skye mched drug dang/ reg pa dang/ tshor ba dang/
146a7(mdo 'grel): sred pa dang/ len pa dang/ srid pa dang/ skye ba dang/ rga shi'i/ /dge slong dag de la skye ba dang rga shi ni mi rtag pa 'dus byas bsags pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ skye ba dang/ 'jig pa'i chos can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos can/ 'gag pa'i
146b1(mdo 'grel): chos can du de ltar yongs su shes par bya'o/ /skye ba dang/ srid pa dang/ len pa dang/ sred pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ reg pa dang/ skye mched drug dang/ ming dang gzugs dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ 'du byed kyang mi rtag pa/ 'du byas pa/ bsags pa/ rten cing 'brel
146b2(mdo 'grel): par 'byung ba/ skye ba dang/ 'jig pa'i chos can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos can/ 'gog pa'i chos can du de yongs su shes par bya ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag gang yang 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa
146b3(mdo 'grel): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag par shes rab kyi ji lta ba bzhin shes shing/ rab tu mthong zhing rab tu rdig la/ rab tu rten cing rab tu yid la byas shing/ legs par so sor rtogs na/ de ci bdag 'das
146b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i dus na byung bar gyur ram 'on te byung bar ma gyur/ bdag 'das pa'i dus na ci zhig du byung bar gyur/ bdag 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar byung bar gyur zhes sngon gyi mdza' rjes su 'brang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'byung bar 'gyur
146b5(mdo 'grel): ram/ 'on te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ci zhig du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur zhes phyi ma mdza' i rjes su 'brang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ci zhig 'di ji ltar
146b6(mdo 'grel): yod pa ni ci zhig 'byung bar ni ci zhig sems can 'di dag gang nas 'ongs shing 'chi 'pho ba na gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes nang gi bdag nyid la the tshom za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang yang dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang kha cig 'jig rten gyi lta bar gyur pa tha dad pa 'di lta ste/ bdag
146b7(mdo 'grel): tu smra ba dang/ yang dag par ldan ba dang/ mtshams sbyor ba byed par smra ba dang/ yang dag par ldan pa dang/ gso bar smra ba dang yang dag par ldan pa dang/ dge mtshan dang bkra shis su smra ba dang/ yang dag par ldan pa dag de'i tshe na yongs su shes shing
147a1(mdo 'grel): yongs su spangs par 'gyur/ rtsa ba bcad par 'gyur te/ shing ta la rtsa ba bcad pa ltar ma 'ongs pa'i skal ba mi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di ltar 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang
147a2(mdo 'grel): ldan pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin shes shing rab tu mthong zhing rab tu rig la rab tu yid la byas shing rab tu rten la legs par so sor rtogs
147a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir ro/ /dge slong dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams bstan par bya'o zhes ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do zhes bka' stsal to/ /ma rig pa tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid
147a4(mdo 'grel): la byed pa'i rgyu can du gsungs zhes bya ba la/ bcom ldan 'das skyabs seng ge'i grong khyer kolma sha daM mya na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/ dge slong dag theg mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba zhes
147a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba nas tshangs par spyod pa yongs su gsal bar byed pa 'di lta ste/ rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya yis de lags par zhes bya ba nas bshad par bya ba'i bar du'o/ /dge slong dag rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas rgyu mtshan dang
147a6(mdo 'grel): bcas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ dge slong dag mig ni rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa ste/ dge slong dag mig gi rgyu ni gang/ rkyen ni gang rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/ dge slong dag las ni rgyu/ las
147a7(mdo 'grel): ni rkyen/ las ni rgyu mtshan no/ /dge slong dag las ni rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'o/ /dge slong dag las kyi rgyu ni gang/ rkyen ni gang/ rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/ dge slong dag las kyi rgyu ni sred pa/ rkyen ni sred pa/
147b1(mdo 'grel): rgyu mtshan ni sred pa'o/ /dge slong dag sred pa yang rgyu dang bcas/ rkyen dang bcas/ rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa ste/ dge slong dag sred pa'i rgyu ni gang/ rkyen ni gang/ rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/ dge slong dag sred pa'i rgyu ni ma rig pa/ rkyen ni ma rig pa rgyu mtshan ni
147b2(mdo 'grel): ma rig pa'o/ /dge slong dag ma rig pa yang rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa ste/ dge slong dag ma rig pa'i rgyu ni gang/ rkyen ni gang/ rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/ dge slong dag ma rig pa'i rgyu ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa/
147b3(mdo 'grel): rkyen ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed ba/ rgyu mtshan ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o/ /dge slong dge? tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yang rgyu dang bcas/ rkyen dang bcas/ rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'o/ /dge slong dag tshul bzhin
147b4(mdo 'grel): ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu ni gang/ rkyen ni gang/ rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/ ming dang gzugs la brten nas ma rig pa las skyes pa yid la byed pa rnyog pa skyes te/ gang rmongs shing kun tu rmongs pa la ma rig pa de srid pa don du gnyer ro/ /sred pa
147b5(mdo 'grel): dang bcas na rnam par rig byed kyi las byed de/ dge slong dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa ni ma rig pa'i rgyu can/ ma rig pa ni sred pa'i rgyu can/ sred pa ni las kyi rgyu can/ las ni mig gi rgyu can no/ /dge slong dag rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/
147b6(mdo 'grel): lus dang/ yid kyang rgyu dang bcas/ rkyen dang bcas/ rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa ste/ dge slong dag yid kyi rgyu ni gang/ rkyen ni gang/ rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/ dge slong dag yid kyi rgyu ni las/ rkyen ni las/ rgyu mtshan ni las so/ /dge slong dag las kyang rgyu
147b7(mdo 'grel): dang bcas/ rkyen dang bcas/ rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa ste/ dge slong dag las kyi rgyu ni gang/ rkyen ni gang/ rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/ dge slong dag las kyi rgyu ni sred pa/ rkyen ni sred pa/ rgyu mtshan ni sred pa'o/ dge slong dag sred pa yang rgyu dang/ rkyen dang
148a1(mdo 'grel): bcas/ rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa ste/ dge slong dag sred pa'i rgyu ni gang/ rkyen ni gang/ rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/ dge slong dag sred pa'i rgyu ni ma rig pa/ rkyen ni ma rig pa/ rgyu mtshan ni ma rig pa'o/ /dge slong dag ma rig pa
148a2(mdo 'grel): yang rgyu dang bcas/ rkyen dang bcas/ rgyu dang mtshan dang bcas pa ste/ dge slong dag ma rig pa'i rgyu dang/ rkyen dang/ rgyu mtshan gang zhe na/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni rgyu'o/ /tshul bzhin ma yin ba yid la byed pa ni rgyu rkyen no/ /tshul
148a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni rgyu mtshan no/ /dge slong dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yang rgyu dang bcas/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yang rkyen dang bcas/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yang rgyu mtshan dang bcas
148a4(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ dge slong dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu ni gang/ rkyen ni gang/ rgyu mtshan ni gang zhe na/ dge slong dag yid dang/ chos la brten nas ma rig pa las skyes pa'i yid la byed pa rnyog pa skyes te/ gang rmongs shing kun du rmongs
148a5(mdo 'grel): la/ ma rig pa de sred pa don du gnyer ro/ /sred pa dang bcas na rnam par rigs kyi las byed de/ dge slong dag tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni ma rig pa'i rgyu can/ ma rig pa ni sred pa'i rgyu can/ sred pa ni las kyi rgyu can/ las ni mig
148a6(mdo 'grel): gi rgyu can te/ 'di ni rgyu dang bcas/ rkyen dang bcas/ rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs te/ dge slong dag rgyu dang bcas/ rkyen dang bcas/ rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'i chos bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du
148a7(mdo 'grel): rgyu dang bcas/ rkyen dang bcas/ rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'i chos bshad pa'i chos bshad par bya'o zhes nges ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do zhes bka' stsal to/ /mdo gzhan las ma rig pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
148b1(mdo 'grel): tshor ba zhes bya ba la phung po'i sngon gyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'i dang po'i mdo mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par mi ldan pa'i 'du byed kyi 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i skabs su bris pa blta bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyed la rten cing 'brel par
148b2(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba'i chos rnams kyang bshad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du de ma thag kho nar de dge slong dag khyed la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams par bshad par bya zhes mdo bris pa blta bar
148b3(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /'di ni mdo'i don ma yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te/ dge slong dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i theg pa dang/ rnam par dbye ba bshad par bya yis
148b4(mdo 'grel): de legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang bshad par bya'o/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dang po gang zhe na/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung/ 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed dang/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes
148b5(mdo 'grel): par rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid
148b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams kun du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig
148b7(mdo 'grel): kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dngos po zhes bya'o/ /rnam par dbye ba gang zhe na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed ces 'byung ba ma rig pa gang zhe na/ sngon gyi mdza' mi shes pa dang/ phyi ma'i mdza' mi shes pa dang/
149a1(mdo 'grel): sngon dang phyi ma'i mdza' mi shes pa dang/ nang mi shes pa dang/ phyi mi shes pa dang/ nang dang phyi rol mi shes pa dang/ las mi shes pa dang/ rnam par smin pa mi shes pa dang/ las kyi rnam par smin pa mi shes pa dang/
149a2(mdo 'grel): rgyu mi shes pa dang/ 'bras bu mi shes pa dang/ rgyu dang 'bras bu mi shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas mi shes pa dang/ chos mi shes pa dang/ dge 'dun mi shes pa dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam mi shes pa dang/ rgyu las
149a3(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes pa dang/ dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams dang/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang/ kha na ma tho ba med pa rnams dang/ brten par bya ba dang brten par bya ba ma yin pa rnams dang/ spang bya dang/ spang bya ma yin pa rnams
149a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ dkar po dang/ nag po rnams dang/ rnam par dbye ba dang bcas pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes pa dang/ 'di ltar reg pa'i skye mched drug 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor ma rig pa ste/ gang
149a5(mdo 'grel): yang de dang de la mi shes pa dang/ ma mthong ba dang/ mngon par ma rtog pa dang/ mun pa dang/ rmongs pa ma rig pa'i mun pa zhes bya ba ste 'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o/ /ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed gang zhe na/ 'du byed ni rnam pa gsum
149a6(mdo 'grel): ste/ lus kyi 'du byed dang/ ngag gi 'du byed dang/ yid kyi 'du byed do/ /'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes 'byung ba rnam par shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang lce dang
149a7(mdo 'grel): lus dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes byung ba ming gang zhe na/ gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi ste/ tshor ba'i phung po dang/ 'du shes kyi phung po dang/ 'du byed kyi phung po dang/ rnam
149b1(mdo 'grel): par shes pa'i phung po'o/ /gzugs gang zhe na/ gzugs gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa ste/ gzugs 'di dang sngar bstan pa thams cad gcig tu bsdus te ? ? ?
149b2(mdo 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces 'byung ba skye mched drug gang zhe na/ nang gi skye mched drug ste/ mig nang gi skye mched dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid nang gi skye mched do/ /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis
149b3(mdo 'grel): reg pa zhes 'byung ba/ reg pa gang zhe na/ reg pa'i tshogs drug ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes 'byung ba tshor ba gang zhe na/ tshor ba gsum ste/
149b4(mdo 'grel): bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'o/ /tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes 'byung ba sred pa gang zhe na/ sred pa gsum pa ste/ 'dod pa'i sred pa dang/ gzugs kyi sred pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i sred
149b5(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes 'byung ba len pa gang zhe na/ nye bar len pa bzhi ste/ 'dod pa nye bar len pa dang/ lta ba nye bar len pa dang/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs nye bar len pa dang/ bdag du smra ba nye bar len pa'o/ /len pa'i
149b6(mdo 'grel): rkyen gyis srid pa zhes 'byung ba srid pa gang zhe na/ srid pa rnam pa gsum ste/ 'dod pa'i srid pa/ gzugs kyi srid pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i srid pa'o/ /srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes 'byung ba skye ba gang zhe na/ sems can de dang de dag
149b7(mdo 'grel): sems can gyi rigs mthun pa de dang der skye zhing yang dag par skye ba dang/ 'jug pa dang/ mngon par grub pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ phung po thob cing khams dang skye mched thob la/ phung po mngon par grub cing dbang po dang grong mngon par rab
150a1(mdo 'grel): tu byung ba ste 'di ni skye ba zhes bya'o/ /skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi shes 'byung ba rga shi gang zhe na/ gang spyi bor skra dkar dang/ 'khogs shing gnyer ma mang ba dang/ rgur po rgu po gre ba sgra dar dar? bos 'gags pa/
150a2(mdo 'grel): lus rgu zhing 'khar ba la brten pa/ sme ba'i thig les lus nyams pa/ lus bcings shing bcings pa dang/ dbang po rnams yongs su nyams shing yongs su smin pa dang/ 'jigs dang 'du byed rnams yongs su snyings shing rgas par
150a3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa 'di ni rga ba zhes bya'o/ /'chi ba gang zhe na/ sems can gyi skal ba mnyam pa de dang de las 'chi 'pho zhing 'jig la nub cing tshe dang drod nyams pa phung po 'phos shing dbang po rnams 'gags te/ shi zhing dus byed par 'gyur ba
150a4(mdo 'grel): 'di ni 'chi ba zhes bya ba ste/ 'chi ba 'di dang rga ba gnyis ka gcig tu bsdus nas rga shi zhes bya'o/ /'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam par dbye ba zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag khyed la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dang po dang
150a5(mdo 'grel): rnam par dbye ba bshad bya'o zhes ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do/ /'di lta ste glang po'i rjes lta bu'i mdo las zhes bya ba la/ glang po'i rjes lta bu'i mdo bar ma'i bdum po tha ma las bstan pa mdzod kyi gnas
